   20: -module(disk_log_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(format(S, A), io:format(S, A)).
   26: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   27: -define(privdir(_), "./disk_log_SUITE_priv").
   28: -define(datadir(_), "./disk_log_SUITE_data").
   29: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   33: -define(privdir(Conf), proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -define(datadir(Conf), proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   35: -endif.
   36: 
   37: -compile(export_all).
   38: 
   39: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   40: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, 
   41:

   46: 	 wrap_ext_ro/1, halt_trunc/1, halt_misc/1, halt_ro_alog/1, 
   47: 	 halt_ro_balog/1, halt_ro_crash/1,
   48:

   50:

   52:

   54: 
   55: 	 wrap_ext_1/1, wrap_ext_2/1,
   56: 
   57: 	 rotate_1/1, rotate_truncate/1, rotate_reopen/1,
   58:          rotate_breopen/1, next_rotate_file/1,
   59: 
   60: 	 head_func/1, plain_head/1, one_header/1,
   61: 
   62: 	 wrap_notif/1, full_notif/1, trunc_notif/1, blocked_notif/1,
   63: 
   64: 	 new_idx_vsn/1, 
   65: 
   66: 	 reopen/1, 
   67: 
   68: 	 block_blocked/1, block_queue/1, block_queue2/1,
   69: 
   70: 	 unblock/1,
   71: 
   72: 	 open_overwrite/1, open_size/1, open_change_size/1,
   73:          open_truncate/1, open_error/1,
   74:

   76: 
   77: 	 error_repair/1, error_log/1, error_index/1,
   78:

  112: %% TODO (old):
  113: %%   - global logs

  119: 
  120: %% These are all tests, the list to be returned by all().
  121: -define(ALL_TESTS,
  122: 	[halt_int, wrap_int, halt_ext, wrap_ext, read_mode, head,
  123: 	 notif, new_idx_vsn, reopen, block, unblock, open, close,
  124: 	 error, chunk, truncate, many_users, info, change_size,
  125: 	 open_change_size, change_attribute, otp_6278, otp_10131,
  126:          otp_16768, otp_16809, rotate]).
  127: 
  128: 
  129: suite() ->
  130:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  131:      {timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
  132: 
  133: all() -> 
  134:     [{group, halt_int}, {group, wrap_int},
  135:      {group, halt_ext}, {group, wrap_ext}, {group, rotate},
  136:      {group, read_mode}, {group, head}, {group, notif},
  137:      new_idx_vsn, reopen, {group, block}, unblock,
  138:      {group, open}, {group, close}, {group, error}, chunk,
  139:      truncate, many_users, {group, info},
  140:      {group, change_size}, change_attribute,
  141:      otp_6278, otp_10131, otp_16768, otp_16809].
  142: 
  143: groups() -> 
  144:     [{halt_int, [], [halt_int_inf, {group, halt_int_sz}]},
  145:      {halt_int_sz, [], [halt_int_sz_1, halt_int_sz_2]},
  146:      {read_mode, [],
  147:       [halt_int_ro, halt_ext_ro, wrap_int_ro, wrap_ext_ro,
  148:        halt_trunc, halt_misc, halt_ro_alog, halt_ro_balog,
  149:        halt_ro_crash]},
  150:      {wrap_int, [], [wrap_int_1, wrap_int_2, inc_wrap_file]},
  151:      {halt_ext, [], [halt_ext_inf, {group, halt_ext_sz}]},
  152:      {halt_ext_sz, [], [halt_ext_sz_1, halt_ext_sz_2]},
  153:      {wrap_ext, [], [wrap_ext_1, wrap_ext_2]},
  154:      {rotate, [],
  155:       [rotate_1, rotate_truncate, rotate_reopen,
  156:        rotate_breopen, next_rotate_file]},
  157:      {head, [], [head_func, plain_head, one_header]},
  158:      {notif, [],
  159:       [wrap_notif, full_notif, trunc_notif, blocked_notif]},
  160:      {block, [], [block_blocked, block_queue, block_queue2]},
  161:      {open, [],
  162:       [open_overwrite, open_size, open_change_size, open_truncate,
  163:        open_error]},
  164:      {close, [], [close_race, close_block, close_deadlock]},
  165:      {error, [], [error_repair, error_log, error_index]},
  166:      {info, [], [info_current]},
  167:      {change_size, [],
  168:       [change_size_before, change_size_during,
  169:        change_size_after, default_size, change_size2,
  170:        change_size_truncate]}].
  171: 
  172: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  173:     Config.
  174: 
  175: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  176:     ok.
  177: 
  178: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  179:     Config.
  180: 
  181: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  182:     Config.
  183: 
  184: 
  185: 
  186: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  187:     Config.
  188: 
  189: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  190:     ok.
  191: 
  192: 
  193: %% Test simple halt disk log, size infinity.
  194: halt_int_inf(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  195:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  196:     ok = disk_log:start(),
  197:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  198:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  199: 			     {format,internal},
  200: 			     {file, File}]),
  201:     simple_log(a),
  202:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  203:     ok = file:delete(File).
  204: 
  205: 
  206: %% Test simple halt disk log, size defined.
  207: halt_int_sz_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  208:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  209:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  210:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,18000},
  211: 			     {format,internal},
  212: 			     {file, File}]),
  213:     simple_log(a),
  214:     ok = disk_log:truncate(a),
  215:     [] = get_all_terms(a),
  216:     T1 = mk_bytes(10000),
  217:     T2 = mk_bytes(5000),
  218:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  219:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  220: 	[T1] ->
  221: 	    ok;
  222: 	E1 ->
  223: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1]})
  224:     end,
  225:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T2),
  226:     {error, {full, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  227:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, T1),
  228:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  229: 	[T1, T2] ->
  230: 	    ok;
  231: 	E2 ->
  232: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T1, T2]})
  233:     end,
  234:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  235:     ok = file:delete(File).
  236: 
  237: %% Test simple halt disk log, size ~8192.
  238: halt_int_sz_2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  239:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  240:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  241:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  242:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  243:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,8191},
  244: 			     {format,internal},
  245: 			     {file, File1}]),
  246:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {type,halt}, {size,8192},
  247: 			     {format,internal},
  248: 			     {file, File2}]),
  249:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {type,halt}, {size,8193},
  250: 			     {format,internal},
  251: 			     {file, File3}]),
  252:     T1 = mk_bytes(8191-16), % 16 is size of header + magics for 1 item
  253:     T2 = mk_bytes(8192-16),
  254:     T3 = mk_bytes(8193-16),
  255:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  256:     ok = disk_log:log(b, T2),
  257:     ok = disk_log:log(c, T3),
  258:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  259: 	[T1] ->
  260: 	    ok;
  261: 	E1 ->
  262: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1]})
  263:     end,
  264:     case get_all_terms(b) of
  265: 	[T2] ->
  266: 	    ok;
  267: 	E2 ->
  268: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T2]})
  269:     end,
  270:     case get_all_terms(c) of
  271: 	[T3] ->
  272: 	    ok;
  273: 	E3 ->
  274: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E3, [T3]})
  275:     end,
  276:     ok = disk_log:truncate(a),
  277:     ok = disk_log:truncate(b),
  278:     {error, {full, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T2),
  279:     {error, {full, b}} = disk_log:log(b, T3),
  280:     [] = get_all_terms(a),
  281:     [] = get_all_terms(b),
  282:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  283:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  284:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  285:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  286:     ok = file:delete(File2),
  287:     ok = file:delete(File3),
  288:     ok.
  289: 
  290: 
  291: %% Test simple halt disk log, read only, internal.
  292: halt_int_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  293:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  294:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  295: 
  296:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  297: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  298:     simple_log(a),
  299:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  300: 
  301:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  302: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File},
  303: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  304:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  305:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  306:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  307:     ok = file:delete(File).
  308: 
  309: %% Test simple halt disk log, read only, external.
  310: halt_ext_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  311:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  312:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  313:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  314: 			     {format,external}, {file, File}]),
  315:     xsimple_log(File, a),
  316:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  317:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  318: 			     {format,external}, {file, File},
  319: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  320:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  321:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}}  = disk_log:blog(a, T1),
  322:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  323:     ok = file:delete(File).
  324: 
  325: %% Test simple wrap disk log, read only, internal.
  326: wrap_int_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  327:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  328:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  329:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  330: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  331:     simple_log(a),
  332:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  333:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  334: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  335:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  336:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  337:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  338:     del(File, 4).
  339: 
  340: %% Test simple wrap disk log, read only, external.
  341: wrap_ext_ro(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  342:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  343:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  344:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  345: 			     {format,external}, {file, File}]),
  346:     x2simple_log(File ++ ".1", a),
  347:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  348:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  349: 			     {format,external}, {file, File},
  350: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  351:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  352:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}}  = disk_log:blog(a, T1),
  353:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}}  = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(a),
  354:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  355:     del(File, 4).
  356: 
  357: %% Test truncation of halt disk log.
  358: halt_trunc(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  359:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  360:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  361:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  362: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  363:     simple_log(a),
  364:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  365:     {error,{badarg,repair_read_only}} =
  366: 	disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  367: 		       {repair, truncate}, {format,internal},
  368: 		       {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  369:     ok = file:delete(File).
  370: 
  371: %% Test truncation of halt disk log.
  372: halt_misc(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  373:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  374:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  375:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  376: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  377:     simple_log(a),
  378:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  379:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  380: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File},
  381: 			     {mode,read_only}]),
  382:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  383:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  384:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:sync(a),
  385:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:reopen(a, "b.LOG"),
  386:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} =
  387:         disk_log:change_header(a, {head,header}),
  388:     {error, {read_only_mode, a}} =
  389:         disk_log:change_size(a, infinity),
  390:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  391:     ok = file:delete(File).
  392: 
  393: %% Test truncation of halt disk log, read only.
  394: halt_ro_alog(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  395:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  396:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  397:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  398: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  399:     simple_log(a),
  400:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  401:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  402: 			     {notify,true}, {format,internal},
  403: 			     {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  404:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  405:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, T1),
  406:     ok = halt_ro_alog_wait_notify(a, T1),
  407:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  408:     ok = file:delete(File).
  409: 
  410: halt_ro_alog_wait_notify(Log, T) ->
  411:     Term = term_to_binary(T),
  412:     receive
  413: 	{disk_log, _, Log,{read_only, [Term]}} ->
  414: 	    ok;
  415: 	Other ->
  416: 	    Other
  417:     after 5000 ->
  418: 	    failed
  419:     end.
  420: 
  421: %% Test truncation of halt disk log, read only.
  422: halt_ro_balog(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  423:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  424:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  425:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  426: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
  427:     simple_log(a),
  428:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  429:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  430: 			     {notify,true}, {format,external},
  431: 			     {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  432:     T1 = "not allowed to write",
  433:     ok = disk_log:balog(a, T1),
  434:     ok = halt_ro_balog_wait_notify(a, T1),
  435:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  436:     ok = file:delete(File).
  437: 
  438: halt_ro_balog_wait_notify(Log, T) ->
  439:     Term = list_to_binary(T),
  440:     receive
  441: 	{disk_log, _, Log,{read_only, [Term]}} ->
  442: 	    ok;
  443: 	Other ->
  444: 	    Other
  445:     after 5000 ->
  446: 	    failed
  447:     end.
  448: 
  449: %% Test truncation of halt disk log, read only, repair.
  450: halt_ro_crash(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  451:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  452:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  453: 
  454:     file:delete(File),
  455:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  456: 			     {format,internal},{file, File}]),
  457:     simple_log(a),
  458:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  459:     crash(File, 10),
  460:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
  461: 			     {notify,true}, {format,internal},
  462: 			     {file, File}, {mode,read_only}]),
  463: 
  464:     Error1 = {error, {read_only_mode, a}} = disk_log:truncate(a),
  465:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
  466: 
  467:     %% crash/1 sets the length of the first item to something big (2.5 kb).
  468:     %% In R6B, binary_to_term accepts garbage at the end of the binary,
  469:     %% which means that the first item is recognized!
  470:     %% This is how it was before R6B:
  471:     %% {C1,T1,15} = disk_log:chunk(a,start),
  472:     %% {C2,T2} = disk_log:chunk(a,C1),
  473:     {C1,_OneItem,7476} = disk_log:chunk(a,start),
  474:     {C2, [], 7} = disk_log:chunk(a,C1),
  475:     eof = disk_log:chunk(a,C2),
  476:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  477:     ok = file:delete(File).
  478: 
  479: 
  480: 
  481: 
  482: 
  483: %% Test wrap disk log, internal.
  484: wrap_int_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  485:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  486:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  487:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  488: 			     {format,internal},
  489: 			     {file, File}]),
  490:     [_] =
  491:         lists:filter(fun(P) -> disk_log:pid2name(P) =/= undefined end, 
  492:                      erlang:processes()),
  493:     simple_log(a),
  494:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  495:     del(File, 4),
  496:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8000, 4}},
  497: 			     {format,internal},
  498: 			     {file, File}]),
  499:     [] = get_all_terms(a),
  500:     T1 = mk_bytes(10000), % file 2
  501:     T2 = mk_bytes(5000),  % file 3
  502:     T3 = mk_bytes(4000),  % file 4
  503:     T4 = mk_bytes(2000),  % file 4
  504:     T5 = mk_bytes(5000),  % file 1
  505:     T6 = mk_bytes(5000),  % file 2
  506:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  507:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T2),
  508:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T3),
  509:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(a, [T4, T5, T6]),
  510:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  511: 	[T2,T3,T4,T5,T6] ->
  512: 	    ok;
  513: 	E1 ->
  514: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T2,T3,T4,T5,T6]})
  515:     end,
  516:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  517:     del(File, 4).
  518: 
  519: %% Test wrap disk log, internal.
  520: wrap_int_2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  521:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  522:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  523:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  524:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  525:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8191,3}},
  526: 			     {format,internal},
  527: 			     {file, File1}]),
  528:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8192,3}},
  529: 			     {format,internal},
  530: 			     {file, File2}]),
  531:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {type,wrap}, {size,{8193,3}},
  532: 			     {format,internal},
  533: 			     {file, File3}]),
  534:     T1 = mk_bytes(8191-16), % 16 is size of header + magics for 1 item
  535:     T2 = mk_bytes(8192-16),
  536:     T3 = mk_bytes(8193-16),
  537:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T1),
  538:     ok = disk_log:log(b, T2),
  539:     ok = disk_log:log(c, T3),
  540:     case get_all_terms(a) of
  541: 	[T1] ->
  542: 	    ok;
  543: 	E1 ->
  544: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1]})
  545:     end,
  546:     case get_all_terms(b) of
  547: 	[T2] ->
  548: 	    ok;
  549: 	E2 ->
  550: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T2]})
  551:     end,
  552:     case get_all_terms(c) of
  553: 	[T3] ->
  554: 	    ok;
  555: 	E3 ->
  556: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E3, [T3]})
  557:     end,
  558:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  559:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  560:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  561:     del(File1, 3),
  562:     del(File2, 3),
  563:     del(File3, 3).
  564: 
  565: %% Test disk log, force a change to next file.
  566: inc_wrap_file(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  567:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  568:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  569:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  570:     File3 = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
  571: 
  572:     %% Test that halt logs gets an error message
  573:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {type, halt},
  574: 			     {format, internal},
  575: 			     {file, File1}]),
  576:     ok = disk_log:log(a, "message one"),
  577:     {error, {halt_log, a}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(a),
  578: 
  579:     %% test an internally formatted wrap log file
  580:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name, b}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,3}},
  581: 			     {format, internal}, {head, 'thisisahead'},
  582: 			     {file, File2}]),
  583:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message one"),
  584:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(b),
  585:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message two"),
  586:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(b),
  587:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message three"),
  588:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(b),
  589:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "message four"),
  590:     T1 = get_all_terms(b),
  591:     ['thisisahead', "message two",
  592:      'thisisahead', "message three",
  593:      'thisisahead', "message four"] = T1,
  594: 
  595:     %% test an externally formatted wrap log file
  596:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name, c}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,3}},
  597: 			     {format,external}, {head,"this is a head "},
  598: 			     {file, File3}]),
  599:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message one"),
  600:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(c),
  601:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message two"),
  602:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(c),
  603:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message three"),
  604:     ok = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(c),
  605:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "message four"),
  606:     ok = disk_log:sync(c),
  607:     {ok, Fd31} = file:open(File3 ++ ".1", [read]),
  608:     {ok,"this is a head message four"} = file:read(Fd31, 200),
  609:     {ok, Fd32} = file:open(File3 ++ ".2", [read]),
  610:     {ok,"this is a head message two"} = file:read(Fd32, 200),
  611:     {ok, Fd33} = file:open(File3 ++ ".3", [read]),
  612:     {ok,"this is a head message three"} = file:read(Fd33, 200),
  613:     ok = file:close(Fd31),
  614:     ok = file:close(Fd32),
  615:     ok = file:close(Fd33),
  616: 
  617:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  618:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  619:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  620:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  621:     del(File2, 3),
  622:     del(File3, 3).
  623: 
  624:

  674:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),

  680: 			     {file, File1}]),

  683: 			     {file, File2}]),

  686: 			     {file, File3}]),

  690:     ok = disk_log:blog(a, B1),
  691:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, B2),
  692:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, B3),
  693:     case get_list(File1, a) of

  695: 	    ok;
  696: 	E1 ->
  697: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, T1})
  698:     end,
  699:     case get_list(File2, b) of
  700: 	T2 ->
  701: 	    ok;
  702: 	E2 ->
  703: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, T2})
  704:     end,
  705:     case get_list(File3, c) of
  706: 	T3 ->
  707: 	    ok;
  708: 	E3 ->
  709: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E3, T3})
  710:     end,
  711:     ok = disk_log:truncate(a),
  712:     ok = disk_log:truncate(b),
  713:     {error, {full, a}} = disk_log:blog(a, B2),
  714:     Error1 = {error, {full, b}} = disk_log:blog(b, B3),
  715:     "The halt log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
  716:     true = info(b, full, false),
  717:     [] = get_list(File1, a),
  718:     [] = get_list(File2, b),
  719:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  720:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  721:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
  722:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  723:     ok = file:delete(File2),
  724:     ok = file:delete(File3),
  725:     ok.

  766: 	    ok;

  773: 	E6 ->

  775:     end,

  826: %% Test rotate disk log, external, size defined.
  827: rotate_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  828:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  829:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  830:     Name = a,
  831:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{8000, 3}},
  832: 			     {format,external},
  833: 			     {file, File}]),
  834:     x2simple_log(File, Name),
  835:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  836:     del_rot_files(File, 4),
  837:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{8000, 3}},
  838:                                 {format,external},
  839:                                 {head_func, {?MODULE, hf_bin, []}},
  840:                                 {file, File}]),
  841:     {B1, _T1} = x_mk_bytes(10000), % lost due to rotation 
  842:     {B2, T2} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % file a.LOG.2.gx 
  843:     {B3, T3} = x_mk_bytes(4000),  % file a.LOG.1.gz 
  844:     {B4, T4} = x_mk_bytes(2000),  % file a.LOG.1.gz
  845:     {B5, T5} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % file a.LOG.0.gz 
  846:     {B6, T6} = x_mk_bytes(5000),  % in the active file 
  847:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B1),
  848:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B2),
  849:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B3),
  850:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(a, [B4, B5, B6]),
  851:     {ok, BinHeader} = hf_bin(),
  852:     Header = binary_to_list(BinHeader),
  853:     T20 = Header ++ T2,
  854:     case get_list(File ++ ".2.gz", Name, rotate) of
  855:         T20 ->
  856:             ok;
  857:         E2 ->
  858:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, T2})
  859:     end,
  860:     T34 = Header ++ T3 ++ T4,
  861:     case get_list(File ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate) of
  862:         T34 ->
  863:             ok;
  864:         E34 ->
  865:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E34, T34})
  866:     end,
  867:     T50 = Header ++ T5,
  868:     case get_list(File ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate) of
  869:         T50 ->
  870:             ok;
  871:         E5 ->
  872:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E5, T5})
  873:     end,
  874:     T60 = Header ++ T6,
  875:     case get_list(File, Name) of
  876:         T60 ->
  877:             ok;
  878:         E6 ->
  879:             test_server_fail({bad_terms, E6, T6})
  880:     end,
  881:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  882:     del_rot_files(File, 3).
  883: 
  884: %% test truncate/1 for rotate logs
  885: rotate_truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  886:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  887:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  888:     Name = a,
  889:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{100, 3}},
  890: 			     {format,external},
  891: 			     {file, File}]),
  892:     B = mk_bytes(60),
  893:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Name, [B, B, B]),
  894:     B = get_list(File, Name),
  895:     B = get_list(File ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  896:     B = get_list(File ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  897:     ok = disk_log:truncate(Name),
  898:     [] = get_list(File, Name),
  899:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".0.gz"),
  900:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".1.gz"),
  901:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  902:     file:delete(File).
  903: 
  904: %% test reopen/2 for rotate logs
  905: rotate_reopen(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  906:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  907:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  908:     Name = a,
  909:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{100, 3}},
  910: 			     {format,external},
  911: 			     {file, File}]),
  912:     B = mk_bytes(60),
  913:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Name, [B, B, B]),
  914:     B = get_list(File, Name),
  915:     B = get_list(File ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  916:     B = get_list(File ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  917:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  918:     ok = disk_log:reopen(Name, File1),
  919:     [] = get_list(File, Name),
  920:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".0.gz"),
  921:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File ++ ".1.gz"),
  922:     B = get_list(File1 ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  923:     B = get_list(File1 ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  924:     B = get_list(File1 ++ ".2.gz", Name, rotate),
  925:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  926:     file:delete(File),
  927:     del_rot_files(File1, 3).
  928: 
  929: %% test breopen/3 for rotate logs
  930: rotate_breopen(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  931:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  932:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  933:     Name = a,
  934:     Head1 = "thisishead1",
  935:     {ok, Name} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,rotate}, {size,{100, 3}},
  936: 			     {format,external},
  937:                              {head, Head1},
  938: 			     {file, File1}]),
  939:     B = mk_bytes(60),
  940:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Name, [B, B, B]),
  941:     FileCont = Head1 ++ B,
  942:     FileCont = get_list(File1, Name),
  943:     FileCont = get_list(File1 ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  944:     FileCont = get_list(File1 ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  945:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  946:     Head2 = "thisishead2",
  947:     ok = disk_log:breopen(Name, File2, Head2),
  948:     Head2 = get_list(File1, Name),
  949:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File1 ++ ".0.gz"),
  950:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file_info(File1 ++ ".1.gz"),
  951:     FileCont = get_list(File2 ++ ".0.gz", Name, rotate),
  952:     FileCont = get_list(File2 ++ ".1.gz", Name, rotate),
  953:     FileCont = get_list(File2 ++ ".2.gz", Name, rotate),
  954:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
  955:     file:delete(File1),
  956:     del_rot_files(File2, 3).
  957: 
  958: %% Test rotate log, force a change to next file.
  959: next_rotate_file(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  960:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
  961:     File1 = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
  962:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
  963: 
  964:     %% Test that halt and wrap logs get error messages
  965:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {type, halt},
  966: 			     {format, internal},
  967: 			     {file, File1}]),
  968:     ok = disk_log:log(a, "message one"),
  969:     {error, {halt_log, a}} = disk_log:next_file(a),
  970: 
  971:     %% test a rotate log file
  972:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name, b}, {type, rotate}, {size, {100,3}},
  973: 			     {format,external},
  974: 			     {file, File2}]),
  975:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message one"),
  976:     ok = disk_log:next_file(b),
  977:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message two"),
  978:     ok = disk_log:next_file(b),
  979:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message three"),
  980:     ok = disk_log:next_file(b),
  981:     ok = disk_log:blog(b, "message four"),
  982:     ok = disk_log:sync(b),
  983:     "message one" = get_list(File2 ++ ".2.gz", b, rotate),
  984:     "message two" = get_list(File2 ++ ".1.gz", b, rotate),
  985:     "message three" = get_list(File2 ++ ".0.gz", b, rotate),
  986:     "message four" = get_list(File2, b),
  987:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
  988:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
  989:     ok = file:delete(File1),
  990:     del_rot_files(File2, 3).
  991: 
  992: simple_log(Log) ->
  993:     T1 = "hej",
  994:     T2 = hopp,
  995:     T3 = {tjena, 12},
  996:     T4 = mk_bytes(10000),
  997:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, T1),
  998:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(Log, [T2, T3]),
  999:     case get_all_terms(Log) of
 1000: 	[T1, T2, T3] ->
 1001: 	    ok;
 1002: 	E1 ->
 1003: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1, [T1, T2, T3]})
 1004:     end,
 1005:     ok = disk_log:log(a, T4),
 1006:     case get_all_terms(Log) of
 1007: 	[T1, T2, T3, T4] ->
 1008: 	    ok;
 1009: 	E2 ->
 1010: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2, [T1, T2, T3, T4]})
 1011:     end.
 1012: 
 1013: xsimple_log(File, Log) ->
 1014:     T1 = "hej",
 1015:     T2 = list_to_binary("hopp"),
 1016:     T3 = list_to_binary(["sena", list_to_binary("sejer")]),
 1017:     T4 = list_to_binary(By = mk_bytes(10000)),
 1018:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T1),
 1019:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Log, [T2, T3]),
 1020:     X = "hejhoppsenasejer",
 1021:     X2 = get_list(File, Log),
 1022:     case X2 of
 1023: 	X -> ok;
 1024: 	Z1 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z1, X2})
 1025:     end,
 1026:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T4),
 1027:     Tmp = get_list(File, Log),
 1028:     case X ++ By of
 1029: 	Tmp -> ok;
 1030: 	Z2 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z2, X ++ By})
 1031:     end.
 1032: 
 1033: x2simple_log(File, Log) ->
 1034:     T1 = "hej",
 1035:     T2 = list_to_binary("hopp"),
 1036:     T3 = list_to_binary(["sena", list_to_binary("sejer")]),
 1037:     T4 = list_to_binary(By = mk_bytes(1000)),
 1038:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T1),
 1039:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(Log, [T2, T3]),
 1040:     X = "hejhoppsenasejer",
 1041:     X2 = get_list(File, Log),
 1042:     case X2 of
 1043: 	X -> ok;
 1044: 	Z1 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z1, X2})
 1045:     end,
 1046:     ok = disk_log:blog(Log, T4),
 1047:     Tmp = get_list(File, Log),
 1048:     case X ++ By of
 1049: 	Tmp -> ok;
 1050: 	Z2 -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z2, X ++ By})
 1051:     end.
 1052: 
 1053: x_mk_bytes(N) ->
 1054:     X = lists:duplicate(N, $a),
 1055:     {list_to_binary(X), X}.
 1056: 
 1057: mk_bytes(N) when N > 4 ->
 1058:     X = lists:duplicate(N-4, $a),
 1059:     case byte_size(term_to_binary(X)) of
 1060:         N -> X;
 1061:         Z -> test_server_fail({bad_terms, Z, N})
 1062:     end.
 1063: 
 1064: get_list(File, Log) ->
 1065:     ct:pal(?HI_VERBOSITY, "File ~p~n", [File]),
 1066:     ok = disk_log:sync(Log),
 1067:     {ok, B} = file:read_file(File),
 1068:     binary_to_list(B).
 1069: 
 1070: get_list(File, Log, rotate) ->
 1071:     ct:pal(?HI_VERBOSITY, "File ~p~n", [File]),
 1072:     ok = disk_log:sync(Log),
 1073:     DFile = filename:rootname(File,".gz"),
 1074:     decompress_file(File, DFile),
 1075:     {ok, B} = file:read_file(DFile),
 1076:     file:delete(DFile),
 1077:     binary_to_list(B).
 1078: 
 1079: decompress_file(FileName, DFileName) ->
 1080:     {ok,In} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary]),
 1081:     {ok,Out} = file:open(DFileName,[write]),
 1082:     Z = zlib:open(),
 1083:     zlib:inflateInit(Z, 31),
 1084:     decompress_data(Z,In,Out),
 1085:     zlib:inflateEnd(Z),
 1086:     zlib:close(Z),
 1087:     _ = file:close(In),
 1088:     _ = file:close(Out),
 1089:     ok.
 1090: 
 1091: decompress_data(Z,In,Out) ->
 1092:     case file:read(In,1000) of
 1093:         {ok,Data} ->
 1094:             Decompressed = zlib:inflate(Z, Data),
 1095:             _ = file:write(Out,Decompressed),
 1096:             decompress_data(Z,In,Out);
 1097:         eof ->
 1098:             ok
 1099:     end.
 1100: 
 1101: 
 1102: get_all_terms(Log, File, Type) ->
 1103:     {ok, _Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log}, {type,Type}, {size,infinity},
 1104: 				{format,internal}, {file, File},
 1105: 				{mode, read_only}]),
 1106:     Ts = get_all_terms(Log),
 1107:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 1108:     Ts.
 1109: 
 1110: get_all_terms(Log) ->
 1111:     get_all_terms1(Log, start, []).
 1112: 
 1113: get_all_terms1(Log, Cont, Res) ->
 1114:     case disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont) of
 1115: 	{error, _R} ->
 1116: 	    test_server_fail({bad_chunk, Log, Cont});
 1117: 	{Cont2, Terms} ->
 1118: 	    get_all_terms1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms);
 1119: 	eof ->
 1120: 	    Res
 1121:     end.
 1122: 
 1123: get_all_terms_and_bad(Log, File, Type) ->
 1124:     {ok, _Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log}, {type,Type}, {size,infinity},
 1125: 				{format,internal}, {file, File},
 1126: 				{mode, read_only}]),
 1127:     Ts = get_all_terms_and_bad(Log),
 1128:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 1129:     Ts.
 1130: 
 1131: get_all_terms_and_bad(Log) ->
 1132:     read_only = info(Log, mode, foo),
 1133:     get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, start, [], 0).
 1134: 
 1135: %% 
 1136: get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont, Res, Bad0) ->
 1137:     case disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont) of
 1138: 	{Cont2, Terms} ->
 1139: 	    get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms, Bad0);
 1140: 	{Cont2, Terms, Bad} ->
 1141: 	    get_all_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ Terms, Bad0+Bad);
 1142: 	eof ->
 1143: 	    {Res, Bad0}
 1144:     end.
 1145: 
 1146: get_all_binary_terms_and_bad(Log, File, Type) ->
 1147:     {ok, _Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log}, {type,Type}, {size,infinity},
 1148: 				{format,internal}, {file, File},
 1149: 				{mode, read_only}]),
 1150:     Ts = get_all_binary_terms_and_bad(Log),
 1151:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 1152:     Ts.
 1153: 
 1154: get_all_binary_terms_and_bad(Log) ->
 1155:     read_only = info(Log, mode, foo),
 1156:     get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, start, [], 0).
 1157: 
 1158: %% 
 1159: get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont, Res, Bad0) ->
 1160:     case disk_log:bchunk(Log, Cont) of
 1161: 	{Cont2, BinTerms} ->
 1162: 	    get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ BinTerms, Bad0);
 1163: 	{Cont2, BinTerms, Bad} ->
 1164: 	    get_all_binary_terms_and_bad1(Log, Cont2, Res ++ BinTerms, 
 1165:                                           Bad0+Bad);
 1166: 	eof ->
 1167: 	    {Res, Bad0}
 1168:     end.
 1169: 
 1170: del(File, 0) ->
 1171:     file:delete(File ++ ".siz"),
 1172:     file:delete(File ++ ".idx");
 1173: del(File, N) ->
 1174:     file:delete(File ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(N)),
 1175:     del(File, N-1).
 1176: 
 1177: del_rot_files(File, 0) ->
 1178:     file:delete(File ++ ".0.gz"),
 1179:     file:delete(File);
 1180: del_rot_files(File, N) ->
 1181:     file:delete(File ++ "." ++ integer_to_list(N) ++ ".gz"),
 1182:     del_rot_files(File, N-1).
 1183: 
 1184: test_server_fail(R) ->
 1185:     exit({?MODULE, get(line), R}).
 1186: 
 1187: xx() ->
 1188:     File = "a.LOG",
 1189:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 1190: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1191:     W = xwr(a, 400),
 1192:     disk_log:close(a),
 1193:     %%    file:delete(File),
 1194:     W.
 1195: 
 1196: %% old: 6150
 1197: %% new: 5910
 1198: xwr(Log, BytesItem) ->
 1199:     NoW = 1000,
 1200:     Item1 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1201:     Item2 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1202:     Item3 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1203:     Item4 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1204:     Item5 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1205:     Item6 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1206:     Item7 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1207:     Item8 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1208:     Item9 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1209:     Item0 = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1210:     Term = [Item1,Item2,Item3,Item4,Item5,Item6,Item7,Item8,Item9,Item0],
 1211:     {W, _} = timer:tc(?MODULE, wr, [Log, Term, NoW]),
 1212:     W/NoW.
 1213: 
 1214: measure() ->
 1215:     proc_lib:start_link(?MODULE, init_m, [self()]).
 1216: 
 1217: init_m(Par) ->
 1218:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1219:     Res = m(),
 1220:     proc_lib:init_ack(Par, Res).
 1221: 
 1222: m() ->
 1223:     {W10, R10, Rep10, C10} = m_halt_int(10),
 1224:     {W11, R11, Rep11, C11} = m_halt_int(100),
 1225:     {W12, R12, Rep12, C12} = m_halt_int(400),
 1226:     {W13, R13, Rep13, C13} = m_halt_int(1000),
 1227:     {W14, R14, Rep14, C14} = m_halt_int(10000),
 1228:     {W2, R2, Rep2, C2} = m_wrap_int(400),
 1229:     {W3, R3, Rep3, C3} = m_many_halt_int(10, 400),
 1230:     {W4, R4, Rep4, C4} = m_many_halt_int(20, 400),
 1231:     {W5, R5, Rep5, C5} = m_many_halt_int(10, 1000),
 1232:     {W6, R6, Rep6, C6} = m_many_halt_int(10, 10),
 1233:     {W7, R7, Rep7, C7} = m_many_halt_int(20, 10),
 1234: 
 1235:     io:format("Type of log            mysec/write  mysec/read"
 1236: 	      "  mysec/repair byte  cpu/write\n"),
 1237:     io:format("===========            ===========  =========="
 1238: 	      "  =================  =========\n"),
 1239:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10)", W10, R10, Rep10, C10),
 1240:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (100)", W11, R11, Rep11, C11),
 1241:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (400)", W12, R12, Rep12, C12),
 1242:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (1000)", W13, R13, Rep13, C13),
 1243:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10000)", W14, R14, Rep14, C14),
 1244:     one_line("wrap,int.  4. (400)", W2, R2, Rep2, C2),
 1245:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10,10)", W6, R6, Rep6, C6),
 1246:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (20,10)", W7, R7, Rep7, C7),
 1247:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10,400)", W3, R3, Rep3, C3),
 1248:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (20,400)", W4, R4, Rep4, C4),
 1249:     one_line("halt,int.inf. (10,1000)", W5, R5, Rep5, C5),
 1250:     io:format("\n"),
 1251:     io:format("\tWrap log time depends on how often the log wraps, as this\n"),
 1252:     io:format("\tinvolves opening of new files, which costs a lot."),
 1253:     io:format("\n").
 1254: 
 1255: one_line(Txt, W, R, Rep, C) ->
 1256:     io:format("~.22s  ~.10w  ~.10w  ~.17w  ~.9w\n", [Txt, W, R, Rep, C]).
 1257: 
 1258: m_halt_int(BytesItem) ->
 1259:     File = "a.LOG",
 1260:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 1261: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1262:     {T,W} = wr(a, BytesItem),
 1263:     R = r(a),
 1264:     [{_,P}] = ets:lookup(?DISK_LOG_NAME_TABLE, a),
 1265:     exit(P, kill),
 1266:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1267:     crash(File, 10),
 1268:     Sz = file_size(File),
 1269:     Start = start_times(),
 1270:     {repaired, a, {recovered, Rec}, {badbytes, Bad}} = 
 1271: 	disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 1272: 		       {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1273:     {_,Rep} = end_times(Start),
 1274:     io:format("m_halt_int: Rep = ~p, Rec = ~p, Bad = ~p~n", [Rep, Rec, Bad]),
 1275:     disk_log:close(a),
 1276:     file:delete(File),
 1277:     {W,R,1000*Rep/Sz,T}.
 1278: 
 1279: m_wrap_int(BytesItem) ->
 1280:     File = "a.LOG",
 1281:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {type,wrap}, {size,{405*1000, 4}},
 1282: 			     {format,internal}, {file, File}]),
 1283:     {T,W} = wr(a, BytesItem),
 1284:     R = r(a),
 1285:     [{_,P}] = ets:lookup(?DISK_LOG_NAME_TABLE, a),
 1286:     exit(P, kill),
 1287:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 1288:     del(File, 4),
 1289:     {W,R,'n/a',T}.
 1290: 
 1291: m_many_halt_int(NoClients, BytesItem) ->
 1292:     Name = 'log.LOG',
 1293:     File = "log.LOG",
 1294:     {ok, _} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, 
 1295: 			     {size,infinity},
 1296: 			     {format,internal}, {file,File}]),
 1297:     NoW = round(lists:max([lists:min([5000000/BytesItem/NoClients,
 1298: 				      50000/NoClients]),
 1299: 			   1000])),
 1300:     {T,W} = many_wr(NoClients, Name, NoW, BytesItem),
 1301:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 1302:     file:delete(File),
 1303:     {1000*W/NoW/NoClients,'n/a','n/a',1000*T/NoW/NoClients}.
 1304: 
 1305: many_wr(NoClients, Log, NoW, BytesItem) ->
 1306:     Item = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1307:     Fun = fun(Name, _Pid, _I) -> disk_log:log(Name, Item) end,
 1308:     Start = start_times(),
 1309:     Pids = spawn_clients(NoClients, client, [self(), Log, NoW, Fun]),
 1310:     check_clients(Pids),
 1311:     end_times(Start).
 1312: 
 1313: wr(Log, BytesItem) ->
 1314:     NoW = round(lists:max([lists:min([5000000/BytesItem,50000]),1000])),
 1315:     Item = mk_bytes(BytesItem),
 1316:     Start = start_times(),
 1317:     wr(Log, Item, NoW),
 1318:     {T,W} = end_times(Start),
 1319:     {1000*T/NoW, 1000*W/NoW}.
 1320: 
 1321: wr(Log, _Item, 0) ->
 1322:     disk_log:sync(Log),
 1323:     ok;
 1324: wr(Log, Item, N) ->
 1325:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, Item),
 1326:     wr(Log, Item, N-1).
 1327: 
 1328: r(_) ->
 1329:     nyi.
 1330: 
 1331: start_times() ->
 1332:     {T1, _} = statistics(runtime),
 1333:     {W1, _} = statistics(wall_clock),
 1334:     {T1, W1}.
 1335: 
 1336: end_times({T1,W1}) ->
 1337:     {T2, _} = statistics(runtime),
 1338:     {W2, _} = statistics(wall_clock),
 1339:     {T2-T1, W2-W1}.
 1340: 
 1341: 
 1342: %% Test head parameter.
 1343: head_func(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1344:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1345:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1346:     ets:new(xxx, [named_table, set, public]),
 1347:     ets:insert(xxx, {wrapc, 0}),
 1348:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1349: 			     {size, {100,4}},
 1350: 			     {head_func, {?MODULE, hf, []}}]),
 1351:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1352:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1353:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1354:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1355:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1356:     H = [1,2,3],
 1357:     [{wrapc, 4}] = ets:lookup(xxx, wrapc),
 1358:     ets:delete(xxx),
 1359:     case get_all_terms(a) of
 1360: 	[H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B] ->
 1361: 	    ok;
 1362: 	E1 ->
 1363: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1,
 1364: 			      [H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B]})
 1365:     end,
 1366:     8  = no_written_items(a),
 1367:     disk_log:close(a),
 1368:     del(File, 4),
 1369: 
 1370:     %% invalid header function
 1371:     {error, {invalid_header, {_, {term}}}} =
 1372: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1373: 		       {format, external},
 1374: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{term}]}}]),
 1375:     file:delete(File),
 1376: 
 1377:     {error, {invalid_header, _}} =
 1378: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1379: 		       {format, external},
 1380: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,{term}}]}}]),
 1381:     file:delete(File),
 1382: 
 1383:     {ok,n} =
 1384: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1385: 		       {format, external},
 1386: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,<<"head">>}]}}]),
 1387:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1388:     {ok,<<"head">>} = file:read_file(File),
 1389:     file:delete(File),
 1390: 
 1391:     {ok,n} =
 1392: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1393: 		       {format, external},
 1394: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]}}]),
 1395:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1396:     {ok,<<"head">>} = file:read_file(File),
 1397:     file:delete(File),
 1398: 
 1399:     Error1 = {error, {badarg, _}} =
 1400: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1401: 		       {head_func, {tjo,hej,san}},{size, {100, 4}}]),
 1402:     "The argument " ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1403: 
 1404:     Error2 = {error, {invalid_header, _}} =
 1405: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1406: 		       {head_func, {tjo,hej,[san]}}]),
 1407:     "The disk log header" ++ _ = format_error(Error2),
 1408:     file:delete(File).
 1409: 
 1410: 
 1411: head_fun(H) ->
 1412:     H.
 1413: 
 1414: hf() ->
 1415:     ets:update_counter(xxx, wrapc, 1),
 1416:     {ok, [1,2,3]}.
 1417: 
 1418: hf_bin() ->
 1419:     {ok, <<"1", "2", "3">>}.
 1420:

 1422: %% Test head parameter.
 1423: plain_head(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1424:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1425:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1426:     H = [1,2,3],
 1427:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1428: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {head, H}]),
 1429:     %% This one is not "counted".
 1430:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1431: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {head, H}]),
 1432:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1433:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1434:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1435:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1436:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1437:     case get_all_terms(a) of
 1438: 	[H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B] ->
 1439: 	    ok;
 1440: 	E1 ->
 1441: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1,
 1442: 			      [H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B]})
 1443:     end,
 1444:     8 = no_written_items(a),
 1445:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
 1446:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(a),
 1447:     del(File, 4).

 1451: %% Test that a header is just printed once in a log file.
 1452: one_header(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1453:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1454:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1455:     H = [1,2,3],
 1456:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1457: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {head, H}]),
 1458:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1459:     ok = disk_log:log(a, B),
 1460:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1461:     ok = disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1462:     ok = disk_log:log(a, B),
 1463:     case get_all_terms(a) of
 1464: 	[H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B] ->
 1465: 	    ok;
 1466: 	E1 ->
 1467: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E1,
 1468: 			      [H,B,H,B,H,B,H,B]})
 1469:     end,
 1470:     8  = no_written_items(a),
 1471:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
 1472:     del(File, 4),
 1473: 
 1474:     Fileb = filename:join(Dir, "b.LOG"),
 1475:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {file, Fileb}, {head, H}]),
 1476:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
 1477:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {file, Fileb}, {head, H}]),
 1478:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "first log"),
 1479:     ok = disk_log:alog(b, "second log"),
 1480:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
 1481:     {ok, b} = disk_log:open([{name,b}, {file, Fileb}, {head, H}]),
 1482:     ok = disk_log:alog(b, "3rd log"),
 1483:     ok = disk_log:log(b, "4th log"),
 1484:     case get_all_terms(b) of
 1485: 	[H, "first log", "second log", "3rd log", "4th log"] ->
 1486: 	    ok;
 1487: 	E2 ->
 1488: 	    test_server_fail({bad_terms, E2,
 1489: 			      [H, "first log", "second log",
 1490: 			       "3rd log", "4th log"]})
 1491:     end,
 1492:     2  = no_written_items(b),
 1493:     ok = disk_log:close(b),
 1494:     ok = file:delete(Fileb),
 1495: 
 1496:     Filec = filename:join(Dir, "c.LOG"),
 1497:     H2 = "this is a header ",
 1498:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {format, external},
 1499: 			     {file, Filec}, {head, H2}]),
 1500:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
 1501:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {format, external},
 1502: 			     {file, Filec}, {head, H2}]),
 1503:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "first log"),
 1504:     ok = disk_log:balog(c, "second log"),
 1505:     ok = disk_log:close(c),
 1506:     {ok, c} = disk_log:open([{name,c}, {format, external},
 1507: 			     {file, Filec}, {head, H2}]),
 1508:     ok = disk_log:balog(c, "3rd log"),
 1509:     ok = disk_log:blog(c, "4th log"),
 1510:     ok = disk_log:sync(c),
 1511:     {ok, Fdc} = file:open(Filec, [read]),
 1512:     {ok,"this is a header first logsecond log3rd log4th log"} =
 1513: 	file:read(Fdc, 200),
 1514:     ok = file:close(Fdc),
 1515:     2  = no_written_items(c),
 1516:     disk_log:close(c),
 1517:     ok = file:delete(Filec),
 1518:     ok.
 1519:

 1522: %% Test notify parameter, wrap.
 1523: wrap_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1524:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1525:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1526:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1527: 			     {size, {100,4}}, {notify, true}]),
 1528:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1529:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1530:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1531:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1532:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1533:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1534:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), a, {wrap, 0}}),
 1535:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, {wrap, 1}}),
 1536:     disk_log:close(a),
 1537:     del(File, 4).
 1538: 
 1539: %% Test notify parameter, wrap, filled file.
 1540: full_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1541:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1542:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1543:     file:delete(File),
 1544: 
 1545:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1546: 			     {size, 100}, {notify, true}]),
 1547:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1548:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1549:     disk_log:alog(a, B),
 1550:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, full}),
 1551:     disk_log:close(a),
 1552:     file:delete(File).
 1553: 
 1554: %% Test notify parameter, wrap, truncated file.
 1555: trunc_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1556:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1557:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 1558:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "a.DUMP"),
 1559:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name, a}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1560: 			     {size, 100}, {notify, true}]),
 1561:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1562:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1563:     disk_log:truncate(a),
 1564:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, {truncated, 1}}),
 1565:     disk_log:log(a, B),
 1566:     ok = disk_log:reopen(a, File2),
 1567:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), a, {truncated, 1}}),
 1568:     disk_log:close(a),
 1569:     file:delete(File),
 1570:     file:delete(File2).
 1571: 
 1572: %% Test notify parameters 'format_external' and 'blocked_log.
 1573: blocked_notif(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1574:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1575:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1576:     No = 4,
 1577:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1578: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 1579: 			     {format, external}]),
 1580:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1581:     Error1 = {error,{format_external,n}} = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1582:     "The requested operation" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1583:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1584:     ok = disk_log:alog(n, B),
 1585:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {format_external, [term_to_binary(B)]}}),
 1586:     ok = disk_log:alog_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 1587:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {format_external,
 1588: 				  lists:map(fun term_to_binary/1, [B,B,B,B])}}),
 1589:     ok = disk_log:block(n, false),
 1590:     ok = disk_log:alog(n, B),
 1591:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {blocked_log, [term_to_binary(B)]}}),
 1592:     ok = disk_log:balog(n, B),
 1593:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {blocked_log, [list_to_binary(B)]}}),
 1594:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 1595:     disk_log:close(n),
 1596:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {blocked_log,
 1597: 				  lists:map(fun list_to_binary/1, [B,B,B,B])}}),
 1598:     del(File, No).
 1599: 
 1600: 
 1601: %% Test the new version of the .idx file.
 1602: new_idx_vsn(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1603:     DataDir = ?datadir(Conf),
 1604:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1605:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "new_vsn.LOG"),
 1606:     Kurt = filename:join(PrivDir, "kurt.LOG"),
 1607:     Kurt2 = filename:join(PrivDir, "kurt2.LOG"),
 1608: 
 1609:     %% Test that a wrap log file can have more than 255 files
 1610:     {ok, new_vsn} = disk_log:open([{file, File}, {name, new_vsn},
 1611: 				   {type, wrap}, {size, {40, 270}}]),
 1612:     ok = log(new_vsn, 280),
 1613:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(add_ext(File, "idx")),
 1614:     <<0,0:32,2,10:32,1:64,1:64,_/binary>> = Bin,
 1615:     disk_log:close(new_vsn),
 1616:     del(File, 270),
 1617: 
 1618:     %% convert a very old version (0) of wrap log file to the new format (2)
 1619:     copy_wrap_log("kurt.LOG", 4, DataDir, PrivDir),
 1620: 
 1621:     {repaired, kurt, {recovered, 1}, {badbytes, 0}} =
 1622: 	disk_log:open([{file, Kurt}, {name, kurt}, 
 1623: 		       {type, wrap}, {size, {40, 4}}]),
 1624:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt, "this is a logged message number X"),
 1625:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt, "this is a logged message number Y"),
 1626:     {ok, BinK} = file:read_file(add_ext(Kurt, "idx")),
 1627:     <<0,0:32,2,2:32,1:64,1:64,1:64,1:64>> = BinK,
 1628:     {{40,4}, 2} = disk_log_1:read_size_file_version(Kurt),
 1629:     disk_log:close(kurt),
 1630:     del(Kurt, 4),
 1631: 
 1632:     %% keep the old format (1)
 1633:     copy_wrap_log("kurt2.LOG", 4, DataDir, PrivDir),
 1634: 
 1635:     {repaired, kurt2, {recovered, 1}, {badbytes, 0}} =
 1636: 	disk_log:open([{file, Kurt2}, {name, kurt2}, 
 1637: 		       {type, wrap}, {size, {40, 4}}]),
 1638:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt2, "this is a logged message number X"),
 1639:     ok = disk_log:log(kurt2, "this is a logged message number Y"),
 1640:     {ok, BinK2} = file:read_file(add_ext(Kurt2, "idx")),
 1641:     <<0,2:32,1:32,1:32,1:32,1:32>> = BinK2,
 1642:     {{40,4}, 1} = disk_log_1:read_size_file_version(Kurt2),
 1643:     disk_log:close(kurt2),
 1644:     del(Kurt2, 4),
 1645: 
 1646:     ok.
 1647: 
 1648: %% Test reopen/1 on halt and wrap logs.
 1649: reopen(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1650: 
 1651:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1652:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1653:     NewFile = filename:join(Dir, "nn.LOG"),
 1654:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1655: 
 1656:     file:delete(File),    % cleanup
 1657:     file:delete(NewFile), % cleanup
 1658:     Q = qlen(),
 1659: 
 1660:     %% External halt log.
 1661:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1662: 			     {notify, true}, {head, "header"},
 1663: 			     {size, infinity},{format, external}]),
 1664:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1665:     ok = disk_log:breopen(n, NewFile, "head"),
 1666:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 2}}),
 1667:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1668:     ok = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1669:     ok = disk_log:breopen(n, NewFile, "head"),
 1670:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 1671:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1672:     {ok,BinaryFile} = file:read_file(File),
 1673:     "head" = binary_to_list(BinaryFile),
 1674:     file:delete(File),
 1675:     file:delete(NewFile),
 1676: 
 1677:     %% Internal halt log.
 1678:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 1679: 			     {notify, true}, {head, header},
 1680: 			     {size, infinity}]),
 1681:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1682:     Error1 = {error, {same_file_name, n}} = disk_log:reopen(n, File),
 1683:     "Current and new" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1684:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile),
 1685:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 2}}),
 1686:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1687:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1688:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile),
 1689:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 1690:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1691:     [header, _B, _B] = get_all_terms(nn, NewFile, halt),
 1692:     file:delete(File),
 1693:     file:delete(NewFile),
 1694: 
 1695:     %% Internal wrap log.
 1696:     No = 4,
 1697:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 1698:     del(NewFile, No),	% cleanup
 1699: 
 1700:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1701: 			     {notify, true},
 1702: 			     {head, header}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 1703:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 1704:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 1705:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 1706:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 1707:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B]),
 1708:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 2}}),
 1709:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B]),
 1710:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 2}}),
 1711:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile, new_header),
 1712:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 8}}),
 1713:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B]),
 1714:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 1715:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B]),
 1716:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 1717:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1718:     [header, _, header, _, header, _, header, _] =
 1719: 	get_all_terms(nn, NewFile, wrap),
 1720:     [new_header, _, header, _, header, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 1721: 
 1722:     del(NewFile, No),
 1723:     file:delete(File ++ ".2"),
 1724:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1725: 			     {notify, true},
 1726: 			     {head, header}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 1727:     %% One file is missing...
 1728:     ok = disk_log:reopen(n, NewFile),
 1729:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 6}}),
 1730:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 1731: 
 1732:     del(File, No),
 1733:     del(NewFile, No),
 1734:     Q = qlen(),
 1735:     ok.
 1736:

 1738: %% Test block/1 on external and internal logs.
 1739: block_blocked(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1740: 
 1741:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1742:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1743:     Halt = join(Dir, "halt.LOG"),
 1744: 
 1745:     %% External logs.
 1746:     file:delete(Halt), % cleanup
 1747:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt},
 1748: 				{format, external}, {file, Halt}]),
 1749:     ok = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1750:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, false),
 1751:     Error1 = {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:block(halt),
 1752:     "The blocked disk" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1753:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1754:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:truncate(halt),
 1755:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:change_size(halt, infinity),
 1756:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1757:         disk_log:change_notify(halt, self(), false),
 1758:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1759:         disk_log:change_header(halt, {head, header}),
 1760:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:reopen(halt, "foo"),
 1761:     ok = disk_log:close(halt),
 1762: 
 1763:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt},
 1764: 				{format, external}]),
 1765:     ok = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1766:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, true),
 1767:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:blog(halt, B),
 1768:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:blog(halt, B),
 1769:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:block(halt),
 1770:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:sync(halt),
 1771:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:truncate(halt),
 1772:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:change_size(halt, infinity),
 1773:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1774:         disk_log:change_notify(halt, self(), false),
 1775:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} =
 1776:         disk_log:change_header(halt, {head, header}),
 1777:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:reopen(halt, "foo"),
 1778: 
 1779:     ok = disk_log:unblock(halt),
 1780:     ok = disk_log:close(halt),
 1781:     file:delete(Halt),
 1782: 
 1783:     %% Internal logs.
 1784:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1785:     No = 4,
 1786:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 1787:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1788: 				{size, {100, No}}]),
 1789:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, true),
 1790:     eof = disk_log:chunk(halt, start),
 1791:     Error2 = {error, end_of_log} = disk_log:chunk_step(halt, start, 1),
 1792:     "An attempt" ++ _ = format_error(Error2),
 1793:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:log(halt, B),
 1794:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(halt),
 1795:     ok = disk_log:unblock(halt),
 1796:     ok = disk_log:block(halt, false),
 1797:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:log(halt, B),
 1798:     {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(halt),
 1799:     Parent = self(),
 1800:     Pid =
 1801:         spawn_link(fun() -> 
 1802:                            {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = 
 1803:                                disk_log:chunk(halt, start),
 1804:                            {error, {blocked_log, halt}} = 
 1805:                                disk_log:chunk_step(halt, start, 1),
 1806:                            Parent ! {self(), stopped}
 1807:                    end),
 1808:     receive {Pid,stopped} -> ok end,
 1809:     ok = disk_log:close(halt),
 1810:     del(File, No).
 1811: 
 1812: %% Run commands from the queue by unblocking.
 1813: block_queue(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1814: 
 1815:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1816:     Q = qlen(),
 1817:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1818:     No = 4,
 1819:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 1820:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 1821: 
 1822:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 1823:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid, {open, File}),
 1824: 
 1825:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1826:     async_do(Pid, {blog, B}),
 1827:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1828:     ok = get_reply(),
 1829:     1 = no_written_items(n),
 1830:     Error1 = {error,{not_blocked,n}} = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1831:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 1832: 
 1833:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1834:     async_do(Pid, {balog, "one string"}),
 1835:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1836:     ok = get_reply(),
 1837:     2 = no_written_items(n),
 1838: 
 1839:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1840:     async_do(Pid, sync),
 1841:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1842:     ok = get_reply(),
 1843: 
 1844:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1845:     async_do(Pid, truncate),
 1846:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1847:     ok = get_reply(),
 1848:     0 = no_items(n),
 1849: 
 1850:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1851:     async_do(Pid, {block, false}),
 1852:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1853:     ok = get_reply(),
 1854:     {error, {blocked_log, _}} = disk_log:blog(n, B),
 1855:     ok = sync_do(Pid, unblock),
 1856: 
 1857:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1858:     async_do(Pid, {change_notify, Pid, true}),
 1859:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1860:     ok = get_reply(),
 1861:     [{_, true}] = owners(n),
 1862: 
 1863:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1864:     async_do(Pid, {change_notify, Pid, false}),
 1865:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1866:     ok = get_reply(),
 1867:     [{_, false}] = owners(n),
 1868: 
 1869:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1870:     async_do(Pid, {change_header, {head, header}}),
 1871:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1872:     {error, {badarg, head}} = get_reply(),
 1873: 
 1874:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1875:     async_do(Pid, {change_size, 17}),
 1876:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1877:     {error, {badarg, size}} = get_reply(),
 1878: 
 1879:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1880:     async_do(Pid, inc_wrap_file),
 1881:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1882:     ok = get_reply(),
 1883: 
 1884:     ok = sync_do(Pid, close),
 1885:     del(File, No),
 1886: 
 1887:     _Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 1888:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid, {int_open, File}),
 1889: 
 1890:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1891:     async_do(Pid, {chunk, start}),
 1892:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1893:     eof = get_reply(),
 1894: 
 1895:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1896:     async_do(Pid, {chunk_step, start, 100}),
 1897:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1898:     {ok, _Cont} = get_reply(),
 1899: 
 1900:     ok = disk_log:block(n, true),
 1901:     async_do(Pid, {log,a_term}),
 1902:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 1903:     ok = get_reply(),
 1904:     1 = no_written_items(n),
 1905: 
 1906:     ok = sync_do(Pid, close),
 1907:     sync_do(Pid, terminate),
 1908:     del(File, No),
 1909: 
 1910:     %% Test of the queue. Three processes involved here. Pid1's block
 1911:     %% request is queued. Pid2's log requests are put in the queue.
 1912:     %% When unblock is executed, Pid1's block request is granted.
 1913:     %% Pid2's log requests are executed when Pid1 unblocks.
 1914:     %% (This example should show that the pair 'queue' and 'messages' 
 1915:     %% in State does the trick - one does not need a "real" queue.)
 1916:     P0 = pps(),
 1917:     Name = n,
 1918:     Pid1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [Name]),
 1919:     {ok, Name} = sync_do(Pid1, {int_open, File, {1000,2}}),
 1920:     Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [Name]),
 1921:     {ok, Name} = sync_do(Pid2, {int_open, File, {1000,2}}),
 1922:     ok = disk_log:block(Name),
 1923:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{1,a}}),
 1924:     ok = get_reply(),
 1925:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{2,b}}),
 1926:     ok = get_reply(),
 1927:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{3,c}}),
 1928:     ok = get_reply(),
 1929:     async_do(Pid1, {alog,{4,d}}),
 1930:     ok = get_reply(),
 1931:     async_do(Pid1, block),
 1932:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{5,e}}),
 1933:     ok = get_reply(),
 1934:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{6,f}}),
 1935:     ok = get_reply(),
 1936:     ok = disk_log:unblock(Name),
 1937:     ok = get_reply(),
 1938:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{7,g}}),
 1939:     ok = get_reply(),
 1940:     async_do(Pid2, {alog,{8,h}}),
 1941:     ok = get_reply(),
 1942:     async_do(Pid1, unblock),
 1943:     ok = get_reply(),
 1944:     ok = sync_do(Pid1, close),
 1945:     ok = sync_do(Pid2, close),
 1946:     sync_do(Pid1, terminate),
 1947:     sync_do(Pid2, terminate),
 1948:     Terms = get_all_terms(Name, File, wrap),
 1949:     true = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g},{8,h}] == Terms,
 1950:     del(File, 2),
 1951:     Q = qlen(),
 1952:     check_pps(P0),
 1953:     ok.
 1954: 
 1955: %% OTP-4880. Blocked processes did not get disk_log_stopped message.
 1956: block_queue2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1957:     Q = qlen(),
 1958:     P0 = pps(),
 1959:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1960:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1961:     No = 4,
 1962: 
 1963:     %% log requests are queued, and processed when the log is closed
 1964:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 1965:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid, {open, File}),
 1966:     ok = sync_do(Pid, block),
 1967:     %% Asynchronous stuff is ignored.
 1968:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [<<"foo">>,<<"bar">>]),
 1969:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [<<"more">>,<<"terms">>]),
 1970:     Fun =
 1971:         fun() ->
 1972:                 {error,no_such_log} = disk_log:sync(n),
 1973:                 receive {disk_log, _, {error, disk_log_stopped}} -> ok end
 1974:         end,
 1975:     SyncProc = spawn_link(Fun),
 1976:     timer:sleep(500),
 1977:     ok = sync_do(Pid, close),
 1978: 
 1979:     %% Make sure SyncProc has terminated to that we know that it has
 1980:     %% received the disk_log error message.
 1981:     SyncProcMonRef = erlang:monitor(process, SyncProc),
 1982:     receive {'DOWN',SyncProcMonRef,process,SyncProc,_} -> ok end,
 1983:     sync_do(Pid, terminate),
 1984:     {ok,<<>>} = file:read_file(File ++ ".1"),
 1985:     del(File, No),
 1986:     Q = qlen(),
 1987:     check_pps(P0),
 1988:     ok.
 1989: 
 1990: 
 1991: %% Test unblock/1.
 1992: unblock(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1993:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 1994:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 1995:     No = 1,
 1996:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 1997: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 1998: 			     {format, external}]),
 1999:     ok = disk_log:block(n),
 2000:     spawn_link(?MODULE, try_unblock, [n]),
 2001:     timer:sleep(100),
 2002:     disk_log:close(n),
 2003:     del(File, No).
 2004: 
 2005: try_unblock(Log) ->
 2006:     Error = {error, {not_blocked_by_pid, n}} = disk_log:unblock(Log),
 2007:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error).

 2010: %% Test open/1 when old files exist.
 2011: open_overwrite(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2012: 
 2013:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2014:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2015:     No = 4,
 2016:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 2017: 
 2018:     %% read write
 2019:     First = "n.LOG.1",
 2020:     make_file(Dir, First, 8),
 2021: 
 2022:     Error1 = {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2023: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2024: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2025:     "The file" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2026:     del(File, No),
 2027: 
 2028:     make_file(Dir, First, 4),
 2029: 
 2030:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2031: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2032: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2033:     del(File, No),
 2034: 
 2035:     make_file(Dir, First, 0),
 2036: 
 2037:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2038: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, 
 2039: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2040:     %% read only
 2041:     make_file(Dir, First, 6),
 2042: 
 2043:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2044: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},{mode, read_only},
 2045: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2046:     del(File, No),
 2047: 
 2048:     make_file(Dir, First, 0),
 2049: 
 2050:     {error, {not_a_log_file, _}} =
 2051: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File},{type, wrap}, 
 2052: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2053: 		       {size, {100, No}}]),
 2054:     del(File, No),
 2055: 
 2056:     {error, _} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2057: 				{mode, read_only},
 2058: 				{format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2059: 
 2060:     file:delete(File),
 2061:     {ok,n} = disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},
 2062: 			    {mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2063:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2064:     ok = unwritable(File),
 2065:     {error, {file_error, File, _}} =
 2066: 	disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},{mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2067:     ok = writable(File),
 2068:     file:delete(File),
 2069: 
 2070:     {ok,n} = disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},{format,external},
 2071: 			    {mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2072:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2073:     ok = unwritable(File),
 2074:     {error, {file_error, File, _}} =
 2075:         disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File},{format,external},
 2076:                        {mode,read_write},{type,halt}]),
 2077:     ok = writable(File),
 2078:     file:delete(File),
 2079: 
 2080:     ok.
 2081: 
 2082: 
 2083: make_file(Dir, File, N) ->
 2084:     {ok, F} = file:open(filename:join(Dir, File), 
 2085:                         [raw, binary, read, write]),
 2086:     ok = file:truncate(F),
 2087:     case N of 
 2088: 	0 ->
 2089: 	    true;
 2090: 	_Else ->
 2091: 	    ok = file:write(F, [lists:seq(1,N)])
 2092:     end,
 2093:     ok = file:close(F).
 2094: 
 2095: %% Test open/1 option size.
 2096: open_size(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2097: 
 2098:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2099:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2100: 
 2101:     No = 4,
 2102:     file:delete(File),
 2103:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2104: 
 2105:     %% missing size option
 2106:     {error, {badarg, size}} =
 2107: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2108: 		       {format, internal}]),
 2109:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2110: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2111:     [n] = disk_log:all(),
 2112:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2113:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B, B, B]),
 2114:     ok = disk_log:sync(n),
 2115:     ok = disk_log:block(n),
 2116: 
 2117:     %% size option does not match existing size file, read_only
 2118:     Error1 = {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2119: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, 
 2120: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2121: 		       {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2122:     "The given size" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2123:     {ok, nn} =
 2124:         disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2125: 			      {mode, read_only},
 2126: 			      {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2127:     [_, _, _, _] = get_all_terms1(nn, start, []),
 2128:     disk_log:close(nn),
 2129: 
 2130:     ok = disk_log:unblock(n),
 2131:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2132:     del(File, No),
 2133: 
 2134:     ok.
 2135: 
 2136: %% OTP-17062. When opening a disk log for the first time, the 'size'
 2137: %% option can change the size of the file.
 2138: open_change_size(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2139: 
 2140:     %% wrap logs
 2141: 
 2142:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2143:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2144: 
 2145:     No = 4,
 2146:     file:delete(File),
 2147:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2148: 
 2149:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2150: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2151:     [n] = disk_log:all(),
 2152:     1 = curf(n),
 2153:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2154:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B, B, B]),
 2155:     4 = curf(n),
 2156:     disk_log:close(n),
 2157: 
 2158:     %% size option does not match existing size file, read_only
 2159:     Error1 = {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2160: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2161: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2162: 		       {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2163:     "The given size" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2164:     {ok, nn} =
 2165:         disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2166: 			      {mode, read_only},
 2167: 			      {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2168:     [_, _, _, _] = get_all_terms(nn),
 2169:     {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2170: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2171: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2172: 		       {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2173:     {error,{badarg,repair_read_only}} =
 2174: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2175: 		       {mode, read_only}, {format, internal},
 2176: 		       {repair, truncate}, {size, {100, No + 1}}]),
 2177:     disk_log:close(nn),
 2178: 
 2179:     %% size option does not match existing size file, read_write
 2180:     No1 = No + 1,
 2181:     No2 = No + 2,
 2182:     %% open/1 can change the size of a newly opened wrap log
 2183:     {ok, nn} =
 2184: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2185: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No1}}]),
 2186:     {100, No1} = info(nn, size, foo),
 2187:     4 = curf(nn),
 2188:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of an open wrap log
 2189:     {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2190: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2191: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No2}}]),
 2192:     ok = disk_log:close(nn),
 2193: 
 2194:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of a newly opened wrap log to 'infinity'
 2195:     {ok, nn} =
 2196: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2197: 		       {format, internal}, {size, infinity}]),
 2198:     {100, 5} = info(nn, size, foo),
 2199:     4 = curf(nn),
 2200:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of an open wrap log
 2201:     {error, {size_mismatch, {100,5}, infinity}} =
 2202: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2203: 		       {format, internal}, {size, infinity}]),
 2204:     ok = disk_log:close(nn),
 2205: 
 2206:     %% size option does not match existing size file, truncating
 2207:     {ok, nn} =
 2208: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2209: 		       {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
 2210: 		       {size, {100, No2}}]),
 2211:     {100, No2} = info(nn, size, foo),
 2212:     1 = curf(nn),
 2213:     [] = get_all_terms(nn),
 2214:     %% open/1 cannot change the size of an open wrap log
 2215:     {error, {size_mismatch, _, _}} =
 2216: 	disk_log:open([{name, nn}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2217: 		       {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
 2218: 		       {size, {100, No2 + 1}}]),
 2219:     ok = disk_log:close(nn),
 2220: 
 2221:     del(File, No),
 2222: 
 2223:     %% halt logs
 2224:     Name = 'log.LOG',
 2225:     HFile = "log.LOG",
 2226:     Finite = 10000,
 2227:     {ok, _} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 2228: 			     {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2229:     ok = disk_log:blog(Name, B),
 2230: 
 2231:     %% open/1 ignores the given size if the halt log is open,
 2232:     %% which is backwards compatible.
 2233:     {ok, Name} =
 2234:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,Finite},
 2235:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2236:     infinity = info(Name, size, foo),
 2237:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 2238:     %% open/1 can change the size of a newly opened halt log
 2239:     {ok, Name} =
 2240:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,Finite},
 2241:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2242:     Finite = info(Name, size, foo),
 2243:     %% open/1 ignores the given size if the halt log is open,
 2244:     %% which is backwards compatible.
 2245:     {ok, Name} =
 2246:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,infinity},
 2247:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2248:     Finite = info(Name, size, foo),
 2249:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 2250: 
 2251:     %% open/1 can open a halt log even if the given size is too small,
 2252:     %% which is backwards compatible.
 2253:     {ok, Name} =
 2254:         disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,halt}, {size,10},
 2255:                        {format,internal}, {file,HFile}]),
 2256:     file:delete(HFile),
 2257:     ok.
 2258: 
 2259: %% Test open/1 with {repair, truncate}.
 2260: open_truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->

 2262:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2263:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2264:     No = 4,
 2265:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2266: 
 2267:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2268: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2269:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2270:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B, B, B]),
 2271:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2272:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2273: 			     {repair,truncate},
 2274: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2275:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2276:     [] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 2277:     del(File, No),
 2278:     ok.
