 2280: 
 2281: %% Try some invalid open/1 options.
 2282: open_error(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2283:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2284: 
 2285:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2286:     No = 4,
 2287:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2288: 
 2289:     {error, {badarg, name}} = disk_log:open([{file, File}]),
 2290:     {error, {badarg, file}} = disk_log:open([{name,{foo,bar}}]),
 2291:     {error, {badarg, [{foo,bar}]}} = disk_log:open([{foo,bar}]),
 2292: 
 2293:     %% external logs, read_only.
 2294:     {error, {file_error, _, enoent}} =
 2295: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2296: 		       {size, {100,No}},
 2297: 		       {format, external}, {mode, read_only}]),
 2298:     Error5 = {error, {file_error, _, enoent}} =
 2299: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2300: 		       {size, 100},
 2301: 		       {format, external}, {mode, read_only}]),
 2302:     true = lists:prefix("\"" ++ File, format_error(Error5)),
 2303: 
 2304:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2305: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2306:     %% Already owner, ignored.
 2307:     {ok, n} =
 2308: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2309: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2310:     Error2 = {error, {name_already_open, n}} =
 2311: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, another_file}, {type, wrap},
 2312: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2313:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error2),
 2314:     Error1 = {error, {arg_mismatch, notify, false, true}} =
 2315: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2316: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}, {notify, true}]),
 2317:     "The value" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2318:     Error3 = {error, {open_read_write, n}} =
 2319: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, 
 2320: 		       {mode, read_only},
 2321: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2322:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error3),
 2323:     {error, {badarg, size}} =
 2324:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2325:                        {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2326:     {error, {arg_mismatch, type, wrap, halt}} =
 2327: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2328: 		       {format, external}]),
 2329:     {error, {arg_mismatch, format, external, internal}} =
 2330: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2331: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2332:     {error, {arg_mismatch, repair, true, false}} =
 2333: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2334: 		       {format, external}, {repair, false}]),
 2335:     {error, {size_mismatch, {100,4}, {1000,4}}} =
 2336: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2337: 		       {format, external}, {size, {1000, No}}]),
 2338:     {error, {arg_mismatch, head, none, _}} =
 2339: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2340: 		       {head, "header"},
 2341: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2342:     {error, {badarg, size}} =
 2343: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2344: 		       {format, external}, {size, 100}]),
 2345: 
 2346:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2347: 
 2348:     {ok, n} =
 2349: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2350: 		       {mode, read_only},
 2351: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2352:     Error4 = {error, {open_read_only, n}} =
 2353: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2354: 		       {mode, read_write},
 2355: 		       {format, external}, {size, {100, No}}]),
 2356:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error4),
 2357:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2358: 
 2359:     del(File, No).
 2360: 
 2361: 
 2362: %% Do something quickly after close/1.
 2363: close_race(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2364:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2365:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2366:     No = 1,
 2367:     del(File, No),  % cleanup
 2368:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2369: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 2370: 			     {format, internal}]),
 2371:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2372:     Error1 = {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(n),
 2373:     "There is no disk" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2374: 
 2375:     %% Pid1 blocks, Pid2 closes without being suspended.
 2376:     Pid1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2377:     Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2378:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid1, {open, File}),
 2379:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid2, {open, File}),
 2380:     ok = sync_do(Pid1, block),
 2381:     [{_, false}, {_, false}] = sync_do(Pid1, owners),
 2382:     ok = sync_do(Pid2, close),
 2383:     [{_, false}] = sync_do(Pid1, owners),
 2384:     ok = sync_do(Pid1, close),
 2385:     sync_do(Pid1, terminate),
 2386:     sync_do(Pid2, terminate),
 2387:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2388: 
 2389:     %% Pid3 blocks, Pid3 closes. Pid4 should still be ablo to use log.
 2390:     Pid3 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2391:     Pid4 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2392:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid3, {open, File}),
 2393:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid4, {open, File}),
 2394:     ok = sync_do(Pid3, block),
 2395:     ok = sync_do(Pid3, close),
 2396:     [{_Pid4, false}] = sync_do(Pid4, owners),
 2397:     sync_do(Pid3, terminate),
 2398:     sync_do(Pid4, terminate),
 2399:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2400: 
 2401:     %% Pid5 blocks, Pid5 terminates. Pid6 should still be ablo to use log.
 2402:     Pid5 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2403:     Pid6 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2404:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid5, {open, File}),
 2405:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid6, {open, File}),
 2406:     ok = sync_do(Pid5, block),
 2407:     sync_do(Pid5, terminate),
 2408:     [{_Pid6, false}] = sync_do(Pid6, owners),
 2409:     sync_do(Pid6, terminate),
 2410:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2411:     del(File, No),  % cleanup
 2412:     ok.
 2413: 
 2414: %% Block, unblock, close, terminate.
 2415: close_block(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2416: 
 2417:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2418:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2419:     No = 1,
 2420:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2421: 
 2422:     P0 = pps(),
 2423:     %% One of two owners terminates.
 2424:     Pid1 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2425:     Pid2 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2426:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid1, {open, File}),
 2427:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid2, {open, File}),
 2428:     [_, _] = sync_do(Pid1, owners),
 2429:     [_, _] = sync_do(Pid2, owners),
 2430:     0 = sync_do(Pid1, users),
 2431:     0 = sync_do(Pid2, users),
 2432:     sync_do(Pid1, terminate),
 2433:     [_] = sync_do(Pid2, owners),
 2434:     0 = sync_do(Pid2, users),
 2435:     sync_do(Pid2, terminate),
 2436:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2437:     check_pps(P0),
 2438: 
 2439:     %% Users terminate (no link...).
 2440:     Pid3 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2441:     Pid4 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2442:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid3, {open, File, none}),
 2443:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid4, {open, File, none}),
 2444:     [] = sync_do(Pid3, owners),
 2445:     [] = sync_do(Pid4, owners),
 2446:     2 = sync_do(Pid3, users),
 2447:     2 = sync_do(Pid4, users),
 2448:     sync_do(Pid3, terminate),
 2449:     [] = sync_do(Pid4, owners),
 2450:     2 = sync_do(Pid4, users),
 2451:     sync_do(Pid4, terminate),
 2452:     disk_log:close(n),
 2453:     disk_log:close(n),
 2454:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2455:     check_pps(P0),
 2456: 
 2457:     %% Blocking owner terminates.
 2458:     Pid5 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2459:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2460: 			     {linkto, none},{size, {100,No}},
 2461: 			     {format, external}]),
 2462:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid5, {open, File}),
 2463:     ok = sync_do(Pid5, block),
 2464:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2465:     [_] = owners(n),
 2466:     sync_do(Pid5, terminate),
 2467:     ok = status(n),
 2468:     [] = owners(n),
 2469:     1 = users(n),
 2470:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2471:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2472:     check_pps(P0),
 2473: 
 2474:     %% Blocking user terminates.
 2475:     Pid6 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2476:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2477: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2478:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid6, {open, File, none}),
 2479:     ok = sync_do(Pid6, block),
 2480:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2481:     [_] = owners(n),
 2482:     1 = users(n),
 2483:     sync_do(Pid6, terminate), % very silently...
 2484:     ok = status(n),
 2485:     [_] = owners(n),
 2486:     1 = users(n),
 2487:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2488:     [] = owners(n),
 2489:     1 = users(n),
 2490:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2491:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2492:     check_pps(P0),
 2493: 
 2494:     %% Blocking owner terminates.
 2495:     Pid7 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2496:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2497: 			     {linkto, none},
 2498: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2499:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid7, {open, File}),
 2500:     ok = sync_do(Pid7, block),
 2501:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2502:     [_] = owners(n),
 2503:     1 = users(n),
 2504:     sync_do(Pid7, terminate),
 2505:     ok = status(n),
 2506:     [] = owners(n),
 2507:     1 = users(n),
 2508:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2509:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2510:     check_pps(P0),
 2511: 
 2512:     %% Two owners, the blocking one terminates.
 2513:     Pid8 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2514:     Pid9 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2515:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid8, {open, File}),
 2516:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid9, {open, File}),
 2517:     ok = sync_do(Pid8, block),
 2518:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2519:     sync_do(Pid8, terminate),
 2520:     ok = status(n),
 2521:     [_] = sync_do(Pid9, owners),
 2522:     0 = sync_do(Pid9, users),
 2523:     sync_do(Pid9, terminate),
 2524:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2525:     check_pps(P0),
 2526: 
 2527:     %% Blocking user closes.
 2528:     Pid10 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2529:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2530: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2531:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid10, {open, File, none}),
 2532:     ok = sync_do(Pid10, block),
 2533:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2534:     [_] = owners(n),
 2535:     1 = users(n),
 2536:     ok = sync_do(Pid10, close),
 2537:     ok = status(n),
 2538:     [_] = owners(n),
 2539:     0 = users(n),
 2540:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2541:     sync_do(Pid10, terminate),
 2542:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2543:     check_pps(P0),
 2544: 
 2545:     %% Blocking user unblocks and closes.
 2546:     Pid11 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2547:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2548: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2549:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid11, {open, File, none}),
 2550:     ok = sync_do(Pid11, block),
 2551:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2552:     [_] = owners(n),
 2553:     1 = users(n),
 2554:     ok = sync_do(Pid11, unblock),
 2555:     ok = sync_do(Pid11, close),
 2556:     ok = status(n),
 2557:     [_] = owners(n),
 2558:     0 = users(n),
 2559:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2560:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2561:     sync_do(Pid11, terminate),
 2562:     check_pps(P0),
 2563: 
 2564:     %% Blocking owner closes.
 2565:     Pid12 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2566:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2567: 			     {linkto, none},
 2568: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2569:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid12, {open, File}),
 2570:     ok = sync_do(Pid12, block),
 2571:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2572:     [_] = owners(n),
 2573:     1 = users(n),
 2574:     ok = sync_do(Pid12, close),
 2575:     ok = status(n),
 2576:     [] = owners(n),
 2577:     1 = users(n),
 2578:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2579:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2580:     sync_do(Pid12, terminate),
 2581:     check_pps(P0),
 2582: 
 2583:     %% Blocking owner unblocks and closes.
 2584:     Pid13 = spawn_link(?MODULE, lserv, [n]),
 2585:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2586: 			     {linkto, none},
 2587: 			     {size, {100,No}}, {format, external}]),
 2588:     {ok, n} = sync_do(Pid13, {open, File}),
 2589:     ok = sync_do(Pid13, block),
 2590:     {blocked, true} = status(n),
 2591:     [_] = owners(n),
 2592:     1 = users(n),
 2593:     ok = sync_do(Pid13, unblock),
 2594:     ok = sync_do(Pid13, close),
 2595:     ok = status(n),
 2596:     [] = owners(n),
 2597:     1 = users(n),
 2598:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2599:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 2600:     sync_do(Pid13, terminate),
 2601:     check_pps(P0),
 2602: 
 2603:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2604:     ok.
 2605: 
 2606: %% OTP-4745. Deadlock with just an ordinary log could happen.
 2607: close_deadlock(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2608:     true = is_alive(),
 2609: 
 2610:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2611: 
 2612:     F1 = filename:join(PrivDir, "a.LOG"),
 2613:     file:delete(F1),
 2614:     Self = self(),
 2615: 
 2616:     %% One process opens the log at the same time as another process
 2617:     %% closes the log. Used to always cause deadlock before OTP-4745.
 2618:     Name = a,
 2619:     Fun = fun() -> open_close(Self, Name, F1) end,
 2620:     P = spawn(Fun),
 2621:     receive {P, Name} -> ok end,
 2622:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name,Name},{file,F1}]),
 2623:     ok = disk_log:close(L),
 2624:     receive {P, done} -> ok end,
 2625:     file:delete(F1),
 2626: 
 2627:     %% One process opens the log at the same time as another process
 2628:     %% closes the log due to file error while truncating.
 2629:     %% This test is time dependent, but does not fail when it does not
 2630:     %% "work". When it works, as it seems to do right now :), the
 2631:     %% disk_log_server gets {error, no_such_log}, receives the EXIT
 2632:     %% message caused by truncate, and tries to open the log again.
 2633:     No = 4,
 2634:     LDir = F1 ++ ".2",
 2635:     file:del_dir(LDir),
 2636:     del(F1, No),
 2637:     ok = file:make_dir(LDir),
 2638:     Fun2 = fun() -> open_truncate(Self, Name, F1, No) end,
 2639:     P2 = spawn(Fun2),
 2640:     receive {P2, Name} -> ok end,
 2641:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name, Name}, {file, F1}, {type, wrap},
 2642: 			     {format, external}]),
 2643:     %% Note: truncate causes the disk log process to terminate. One
 2644:     %% cannot say if open above happened before, after, or during the
 2645:     %% termination. The link to the owner is removed before termination.
 2646:     case disk_log:close(L) of
 2647: 	ok -> ok;
 2648: 	{error,no_such_log} ->
 2649: 	    ok
 2650:     end,
 2651:     receive {P2, done} -> ok end,
 2652:     del(F1, No),
 2653:     file:del_dir(LDir),
 2654:     ok.
 2655: 
 2656: open_close(Pid, Name, File) ->
 2657:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name,Name},{file,File}]),
 2658:     Pid ! {self(), Name},
 2659:     ok = disk_log:close(L),
 2660:     Pid ! {self(), done}.
 2661: 
 2662: open_truncate(Pid, Name, File, No) ->
 2663:     {ok, L} = disk_log:open([{name, Name}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2664:                              {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2665:     Pid ! {self(), Name},
 2666:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:truncate(L),
 2667:     %% The file has been closed, the disklog process has terminated.
 2668:     Pid ! {self(), done}.
 2669: 
 2670: async_do(Pid, Req) ->
 2671:     Pid ! {self(), Req},
 2672:     %% make sure the request is queued
 2673:     timer:sleep(100).
 2674: 
 2675: get_reply() ->
 2676:     receive Reply -> 
 2677: 	    Reply 
 2678:     end.
 2679: 
 2680: sync_do(Pid, Req) ->
 2681:     Pid ! {self(), Req},
 2682:     receive
 2683:         Reply when Req =:= terminate ->
 2684:             timer:sleep(500),
 2685:             Reply;
 2686: 	Reply ->
 2687: 	    Reply
 2688:     end.
 2689: 
 2690: lserv(Log) ->
 2691:     receive
 2692: 	{From, {open, File}} ->
 2693: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2694: 				  {size, {100,1}}, {format, external}]);
 2695: 	{From, {open, File, LinkTo}} ->
 2696: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2697: 				  {linkto, LinkTo}, {size, {100,1}}, 
 2698: 				  {format, external}]);
 2699: 	{From, {int_open, File}} ->
 2700: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2701: 				  {size, {100,1}}]);
 2702: 	{From, {int_open, File, Size}} ->
 2703: 	    From ! disk_log:open([{name, Log}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2704: 				  {size, Size}]);
 2705: 	{From, block} ->
 2706: 	    From ! disk_log:block(Log);
 2707: 	{From, {block, Bool}} ->
 2708: 	    From ! disk_log:block(Log, Bool);
 2709: 	{From, unblock} ->
 2710: 	    From ! disk_log:unblock(Log);
 2711: 	{From, close} ->
 2712: 	    From ! disk_log:close(Log);
 2713: 	{From, owners} ->
 2714: 	    From ! owners(Log);
 2715: 	{From, users} ->
 2716: 	    From ! users(Log);
 2717: 	{From, sync} ->
 2718: 	    From ! disk_log:sync(Log);
 2719: 	{From, truncate} ->
 2720: 	    From ! disk_log:truncate(Log);
 2721: 	{From, terminate} ->
 2722: 	    From ! terminated,
 2723: 	    exit(normal);
 2724: 	{From, {log, B}} ->
 2725: 	    From ! disk_log:log(Log, B);
 2726: 	{From, {blog, B}} ->
 2727: 	    From ! disk_log:blog(Log, B);
 2728: 	{From, {alog, B}} ->
 2729: 	    From ! disk_log:alog(Log, B);
 2730: 	{From, {balog, B}} ->
 2731: 	    From ! disk_log:balog(Log, B);
 2732: 	{From, {change_notify, Pid, Bool}} ->
 2733: 	    From ! disk_log:change_notify(Log, Pid, Bool);
 2734: 	{From, {change_header, Header}} ->
 2735: 	    From ! disk_log:change_header(Log, Header);
 2736: 	{From, {change_size, Size}} ->
 2737: 	    From ! disk_log:change_size(Log, Size);
 2738: 	{From, inc_wrap_file} ->
 2739: 	    From ! disk_log:inc_wrap_file(Log);
 2740: 	{From, {chunk, Cont}} ->
 2741: 	    From ! disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont);
 2742: 	{From, {chunk_step, Cont, N}} ->
 2743: 	    From ! disk_log:chunk_step(Log, Cont, N);
 2744: 	Any ->
 2745: 	    io:format("invalid request ~p~n", [Any]),
 2746: 	    exit(abnormal)
 2747:     end,
 2748:     lserv(Log).
 2749: 
 2750: 
 2751: %% Error while repairing.
 2752: error_repair(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2753:     %% not all error situations are covered by this test
 2754: 
 2755:     DataDir = ?datadir(Conf),
 2756:     PrivDir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2757: 
 2758:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, "n.LOG"),
 2759:     No = 4,
 2760:     file:delete(File),
 2761:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2762: 
 2763:     %% kurt.LOG is not closed and has four logged items, one is recovered
 2764:     copy_wrap_log("kurt.LOG", "n.LOG", No, DataDir, PrivDir),
 2765:     {repaired,n,{recovered,1},{badbytes,0}} =
 2766: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size,{40,No}}]),
 2767:     1 = cur_cnt(n),
 2768:     53 = curb(n),
 2769:     4 = no_items(n),
 2770:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2771: 
 2772:     %% temporary repair file cannot be created
 2773:     copy_wrap_log("kurt.LOG", "n.LOG", No, DataDir, PrivDir),
 2774:     Dir = File ++ ".4" ++ ".TMP",
 2775:     ok = file:make_dir(Dir),
 2776:     P0 = pps(),
 2777:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} =
 2778: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size,{40,4}}]),
 2779:     check_pps(P0),
 2780:     del(File, No),
 2781:     ok = file:del_dir(Dir),
 2782: 
 2783:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE, self()),
 2784:     %% repair a file
 2785:     P1 = pps(),
 2786:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2787: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {38,No}}]),
 2788:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [{this,is}]), % first file full
 2789:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [{some,terms}]), % second file full
 2790:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2791:     BadFile = add_ext(File, 2), % current file
 2792:     set_opened(BadFile),
 2793:     crash(BadFile, 26), % the binary is now invalid
 2794:     {repaired,n,{recovered,0},{badbytes,24}} =
 2795: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2796: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {38,No}}]),
 2797:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2798:     check_pps(P1),
 2799:     del(File, No),
 2800:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2801:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2802: 
 2803:     %% yet another repair
 2804:     P2 = pps(),
 2805:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2806: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {4000,No}}]),
 2807:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [{this,is},{some,terms}]),
 2808:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2809:     BadFile2 = add_ext(File, 1), % current file
 2810:     set_opened(BadFile2),
 2811:     crash(BadFile2, 47), % the second binary is now invalid
 2812:     {repaired,n,{recovered,1},{badbytes,24}} =
 2813: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2814: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {4000,No}}]),
 2815:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2816:     check_pps(P2),
 2817:     del(File, No),
 2818:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2819:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2820: 
 2821:     %% Repair, large term
 2822:     Big = term_to_binary(lists:duplicate(66000,$a)),
 2823:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2824: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {40,No}}]),
 2825:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [Big]),
 2826:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2827:     set_opened(add_ext(File, 1)),
 2828:     {repaired,n,{recovered,1},{badbytes,0}} =
 2829: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2830: 		       {format, internal}, {size, {40,No}}]),
 2831:     {_, [Got]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 2832:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2833:     Got = Big,
 2834:     del(File, No),
 2835:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2836:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2837: 
 2838:     %% A term a little smaller than a chunk, then big terms.
 2839:     BigSmall = mk_bytes(1024*64-8-12),
 2840:     file:delete(File),
 2841:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2842: 			     {format, internal}]),
 2843:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [BigSmall, Big, Big]),
 2844:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2845:     set_opened(File),
 2846:     FileSize = file_size(File),
 2847:     crash(File, FileSize-byte_size(Big)-4),
 2848:     Error1 = {error, {need_repair, _}} =
 2849:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {repair, false},
 2850:                        {type, halt}, {format, internal}]),
 2851:     "The disk log" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 2852:     {repaired,n,{recovered,2},{badbytes,132013}} =
 2853:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {repair, true},
 2854:                        {type, halt}, {format, internal}]),
 2855:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2856:     file:delete(File),
 2857:     receive {info_msg, _, "disk_log: repairing" ++ _, _} -> ok
 2858:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(failed) end,
 2859: 
 2860:     %% The header is recovered.
 2861:     {ok,n} =
 2862: 	disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2863: 		       {format, internal},
 2864: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]}}]),
 2865:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [list,'of',terms]),
 2866:     ["head",list,'of',terms] = get_all_terms(n),
 2867:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2868:     set_opened(File),
 2869:     crash(File, 30),
 2870:     {repaired,n,{recovered,3},{badbytes,15}} =
 2871:         disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2872: 		       {format, internal},{repair,true}, {quiet, true},
 2873: 		       {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]}}]),
 2874:     ["head",'of',terms] = get_all_terms(n),
 2875:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2876:     error_logger:delete_report_handler(?MODULE),
 2877:     file:delete(File),
 2878:     {messages, []} = process_info(self(), messages),
 2879: 
 2880:     ok.
 2881: 
 2882: set_opened(File) ->
 2883:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [raw, binary, read, write]),
 2884:     ok = file:write(Fd, [?LOGMAGIC, ?OPENED]),
 2885:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 2886: 
 2887: %% Error while repairing.
 2888: error_log(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2889:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2890: 
 2891:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2892:     No = 4,
 2893:     file:delete(File),
 2894:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 2895:     LDir = File ++ ".2",
 2896: 
 2897:     Q = qlen(),
 2898:     %% dummy just to get all processes "above" disk_log going
 2899:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2900: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2901:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2902:     del(File, No),
 2903: 
 2904:     %% inc_wrap_file fails, the external log is not terminated
 2905:     P0 = pps(),
 2906:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2907: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2908:     ok = file:make_dir(LDir),
 2909:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(n),
 2910:     timer:sleep(500),
 2911:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2912:     del(File, No),
 2913: 
 2914:     %% inc_wrap_file fails, the internal log is not terminated, ./File.2/ exists
 2915:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2916: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2917:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:inc_wrap_file(n),
 2918:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2919:     del(File, No),
 2920: 
 2921:     %% truncate fails, the log is terminated, ./File.2/ exists
 2922:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2923: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2924:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:truncate(n),
 2925:     check_pps(P0),
 2926:     del(File, No),
 2927: 
 2928:     %% OTP-4880.
 2929:     %% reopen (rename) fails, the log is terminated, ./File.2/ exists
 2930:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, halt},
 2931: 			     {format, external},{size, 100000}]),
 2932:     {error, {file_error, _, eisdir}} = disk_log:reopen(n, LDir),
 2933:     check_pps(P0),
 2934:     file:delete(File),
 2935: 
 2936:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2937: 
 2938:     %% OTP-4880. reopen a wrap log, rename fails
 2939:     File2 = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG2"),
 2940:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File2}, {type, wrap},
 2941: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2942:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2943:     {error, {file_error, _, eisdir}} = disk_log:reopen(n, File),
 2944:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(n),
 2945:     del(File2, No),
 2946:     del(File, No),
 2947: 
 2948:     %% log, external wrap log, ./File.2/ exists
 2949:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2950: 			     {format, external},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2951:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2952:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2953:     del(File, No),
 2954: 
 2955:     %% log, internal wrap log, ./File.2/ exists
 2956:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2957: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2958:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2959:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2960:     del(File, No),
 2961: 
 2962:     ok = file:del_dir(LDir),
 2963: 
 2964:     %% can't remove file when changing size
 2965:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2966: 			     {format, internal},{size, {100, No}}]),
 2967:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 2968:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, No-2}),
 2969:     Three = File ++ ".3",
 2970:     ok = file:delete(Three),
 2971:     ok = file:make_dir(Three),
 2972:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 2973:     timer:sleep(500),
 2974:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 2975:     ok = file:del_dir(Three),
 2976:     del(File, No),
 2977:     Q = qlen(),
 2978:     ok.
 2979: 
 2980: %% Test chunk and chunk_step.
 2981: chunk(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 2982:     %% See also halt_ro_crash/1 above.
 2983: 
 2984:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 2985:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 2986:     No = 4,
 2987:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 2988:     BB = mk_bytes(64000), % 64 kB chunks
 2989:     del(File, No),% cleanup
 2990: 
 2991:     %% Make sure chunk_step skips the rest of the binary.
 2992:     %% OTP-3716. This was a bug...
 2993:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 2994: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {50,No}}]),
 2995:     %% 1, 2 and 3 on file one, 4 on file two.
 2996:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [1,2,3,4]),
 2997:     {I1, [1]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start, 1),
 2998:     [{node,Node}] = disk_log:chunk_info(I1),
 2999:     Node = node(),
 3000:     Error1 = {error, {no_continuation, foobar}} =
 3001:         disk_log:chunk_info(foobar),
 3002:     "The term" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 3003:     {ok, I2} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, I1, 1),
 3004:     {error, {badarg, continuation}} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, foobar, 1),
 3005:     {I3, [4]} = disk_log:chunk(n, I2, 1),
 3006:     {ok, I4} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, I3, -1),
 3007:     {_, [1]} = disk_log:chunk(n, I4, 1),
 3008:     {error, {badarg, continuation}} = disk_log:bchunk(n, 'begin'),
 3009:     {Ib1, [Bin1,Bin2]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, start, 2),
 3010:     1 = binary_to_term(Bin1),
 3011:     2 = binary_to_term(Bin2),
 3012:     {ok, Ib2} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, Ib1, 1),
 3013:     {Ib3, [Bin3]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib2, 1),
 3014:     4 = binary_to_term(Bin3),
 3015:     {ok, Ib4} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, Ib3, -1),
 3016:     {_, [Bin4]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib4, 1),
 3017:     1 = binary_to_term(Bin4),
 3018:     {Ib5, [Bin1, Bin2, Bin17]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, start),
 3019:     3 = binary_to_term(Bin17),
 3020:     {Ib6, [Bin3]} = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib5, infinity),
 3021:     eof = disk_log:bchunk(n, Ib6, infinity),
 3022:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3023:     del(File, No), % cleanup
 3024: 
 3025:     %% external log, cannot read chunks
 3026:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3027: 			     {format, external}, {size, {100,No}}]),
 3028:     {error, {badarg, continuation}} = disk_log:chunk(n, 'begin'),
 3029:     {error, {format_external, n}} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),

 3031:         disk_log:chunk_step(n, start, 1),

 3035:

 3038: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {100,No}}]),
 3039:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B,B]),
 3040:     {C1, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3041:     {C2, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C1),
 3042:     {C3, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C2),
 3043:     {C4, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C3, 1),
 3044:     eof = disk_log:chunk(n, C4),
 3045:     {C5, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3046:     {ok, C6} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, C5, 1),
 3047:     {C7, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C6),
 3048:     {ok, C8} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, C7, 1),
 3049:     {_, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, C8),
 3050:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3051:

 3054: 			     {mode, read_only},
 3055: 			     {format, internal}, {size, {100,No}}]),
 3056:     {CC1, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, start),
 3057:     {CC2, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC1),
 3058:     {CC3, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC2),

 3060:     eof = disk_log:chunk(n, CC4),

 3063:     {CC7, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC6),
 3064:     {ok, CC8} = disk_log:chunk_step(n, CC7, 1),
 3065:     {_, [_]} = disk_log:chunk(n, CC8),
 3066:     ok = disk_log:close(n),

 3255: 			     {format, internal}]),

 3257:     ok = disk_log:close(n),

 3261:     DataDir = ?datadir(Conf),
 3262:     OldTermsFileOrig = filename:join(DataDir, "old_terms.LOG"),
 3263:     OldTermsFile = filename:join(Dir, "old_terms.LOG"),
 3264:     copy_file(OldTermsFileOrig, OldTermsFile),
 3265:     {[_,_,_,_],0} = get_all_terms_and_bad(n, OldTermsFile, halt),
 3266:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, OldTermsFile},
 3267: 			     {type, halt}, {format, internal}]),
 3268:     [_,_,_,_] = get_all_terms(n),
 3269:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3270:     file:delete(OldTermsFile),
 3271: 
 3272:     ok.

 3274: %% OTP-5558. Keep the contents of index files after disk crash.
 3275: error_index(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3276:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3277: 
 3278:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 3279:     IdxFile = File ++ ".idx",
 3280:     No = 4,
 3281:     file:delete(File),
 3282:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 3283: 
 3284:     Args = [{name,n},{type,wrap},{size,{100,No}},{file,File}],
 3285:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3286:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3287:     Q = qlen(),
 3288:     P0 = pps(),
 3289:     ok = file:write_file(IdxFile, <<"abc">>),
 3290:     {error, {invalid_index_file, _}} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3291:     {error, {invalid_index_file, _}} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3292:     {error, {invalid_index_file, _}} = disk_log:open(Args),
 3293: 
 3294:     del(File, No),
 3295:     check_pps(P0),
 3296:     true = (Q == qlen()),
 3297:     ok.
 3298: 
 3299: %% Test truncate/1 on halt and wrap logs.
 3300: truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3301:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3302: 
 3303:     Q = qlen(),
 3304:     Halt = join(Dir, "halt.LOG"),
 3305:     %% Halt logs.
 3306: 
 3307:     file:delete(Halt), % cleanup
 3308:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt}, {file, Halt},
 3309: 				{head, header}, {notify, true}]),
 3310:     infinity = sz(halt),
 3311:     ok = disk_log:truncate(halt, tjohej),
 3312:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), halt, {truncated, 1}}),
 3313:     ok = disk_log:change_size(halt, 10000),
 3314:     10000 = sz(halt),
 3315:     disk_log:close(halt),
 3316:     [tjohej] = get_all_terms(halt, Halt, halt),
 3317:     file:delete(Halt),
 3318: 
 3319:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt}, {file, Halt},
 3320: 				{head, header}, {notify, true}]),
 3321:     ok = disk_log:truncate(halt),
 3322:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), halt, {truncated, 1}}),
 3323:     disk_log:close(halt),
 3324:     [header] = get_all_terms(halt, Halt, halt),
 3325:     file:delete(Halt),
 3326: 
 3327:     {ok, halt} = disk_log:open([{name, halt}, {type, halt},
 3328: 				{file, Halt}, {format, external},
 3329: 				{head, "header"}, {notify, false}]),
 3330:     ok = disk_log:btruncate(halt, "apa"),
 3331:     disk_log:close(halt),
 3332:     3 = file_size(Halt),
 3333:     file:delete(Halt),
 3334: 
 3335:     %% Wrap logs.
 3336:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 3337:     No = 4,
 3338:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 3339:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 3340: 
 3341:     %% Internal with header.
 3342:     Size = {100, No},
 3343:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3344: 			     {head, header}, {notify, true},
 3345: 			     {size, Size}]),
 3346:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 3347:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 3348:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3349:     ok = disk_log:truncate(n, apa),
 3350:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 6}}),
 3351:     {0, 0} = no_overflows(n),
 3352:     22 = curb(n),
 3353:     1 = curf(n),
 3354:     1 = cur_cnt(n),
 3355:     true = (Size == sz(n)),
 3356: 
 3357:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B]),
 3358:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3359:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3360:     [apa, _, header, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 3361:     del(File, No),
 3362: 
 3363:     %% Internal without general header.
 3364:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3365: 			     {notify, true},
 3366: 			     {size, {100, No}}]),
 3367:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 3368:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3369:     ok = disk_log:truncate(n, apa),
 3370:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 3371:     {0, 0} = no_overflows(n),
 3372:     22 = curb(n),
 3373:     1 = curf(n),
 3374:     1 = cur_cnt(n),
 3375:     true = (Size == sz(n)),
 3376: 
 3377:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B]),
 3378:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3379:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3380:     [apa, _, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 3381:     del(File, No),
 3382: 
 3383:     %% Internal without any header.
 3384:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3385: 			     {notify, true},
 3386: 			     {size, {100, No}}]),
 3387:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B,B]),
 3388:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3389:     ok = disk_log:truncate(n),
 3390:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {truncated, 3}}),
 3391:     {0, 0} = no_overflows(n),
 3392:     8 = curb(n),
 3393:     1 = curf(n),
 3394:     0 = cur_cnt(n),
 3395:     true = (Size == sz(n)),
 3396: 
 3397:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B, B]),
 3398:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 3399:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3400:     [_, _] = get_all_terms(n, File, wrap),
 3401:     del(File, No),
 3402:     Q = qlen(),
 3403:     ok.
 3404: 
 3405: 
 3406: %% Test many users logging and sync:ing at the same time.
 3407: many_users(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3408:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3409:     N = 100,
 3410:     NoClients = 10,
 3411:     Fun1 = fun(Name, Pid, I) -> disk_log:log(Name, {Pid, I}) end,
 3412:     Fun2 = fun(Name, Pid, I) -> ok = disk_log:log(Name, {Pid, I}),
 3413: 				disk_log:sync(Name) end,
 3414:     {C1, T1} = many(Fun2, NoClients, N, halt, internal, infinity, Dir),
 3415:     true = lists:duplicate(NoClients, ok) == C1,
 3416:     true = length(T1) == N*NoClients,
 3417:     {C2, T2} = many(Fun1, NoClients, N, halt, internal, 1000, Dir),
 3418:     true = lists:duplicate(NoClients, {error, {full,"log.LOG"}}) == C2,
 3419:     true = length(T2) > 0,
 3420:     {C3, T3} = many(Fun2, NoClients, N, wrap, internal,
 3421: 		    {300*NoClients,200}, Dir),
 3422:     true = lists:duplicate(NoClients, ok) == C3,
 3423:     true = length(T3) == N*NoClients,
 3424:     ok.
 3425: 
 3426: many(Fun, NoClients, N, Type, Format, Size, Dir) ->
 3427:     Name = "log.LOG",
 3428:     File = filename:join(Dir, Name),
 3429:     del_files(Size, File),
 3430:     Q = qlen(),
 3431:     {ok, _} = disk_log:open([{name,Name}, {type,Type}, {size,Size},
 3432: 			     {format,Format}, {file,File}]),
 3433:     Pids = spawn_clients(NoClients, client, [self(), Name, N, Fun]),
 3434:     Checked = check_clients(Pids),
 3435:     ok = disk_log:close(Name),
 3436:     Terms = get_all_terms(Name, File, Type),
 3437:     del_files(Size, File),
 3438:     Q = qlen(),
 3439:     {Checked, Terms}.
 3440: 
 3441: spawn_clients(0, _F, _A) ->
 3442:     [];
 3443: spawn_clients(I, F, A) ->
 3444:     [spawn_link(?MODULE, F, A) | spawn_clients(I-1, F, A)].
 3445: 
 3446: check_clients(Pids) ->
 3447:     lists:map(fun(Pid) -> receive {Pid, Reply} -> Reply end end, Pids).
 3448: 
 3449: client(From, _Name, 0, _Fun) ->
 3450:     From ! {self(), ok};
 3451: client(From, Name, N, Fun) ->
 3452:     %% Fun is called N times.
 3453:     case Fun(Name, self(), N) of
 3454: 	ok -> client(From, Name, N-1, Fun);
 3455: 	Else -> From ! {self(), Else}
 3456:     end.
 3457: 
 3458: del_files({_NoBytes,NoFiles}, File) ->
 3459:     del(File, NoFiles);
 3460: del_files(_Size, File) ->
 3461:     file:delete(File).
 3462: 
 3463: 
 3464: 
 3465:

 3468: 
 3469:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),

 3471:     No = 4,
 3472:     B = mk_bytes(60),

 3474:     SB = mk_bytes(10),  % much smaller than a single wrap log file
 3475:     del(File, No),% cleanup
 3476: 
 3477:     Q = qlen(),
 3478:     %% Internal with header.
 3479:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3480: 			     {head, header}, {size, {100,No}}]),

 3484:     {93, 2} = {curb(n), cur_cnt(n)},
 3485:     {2, 2}  = {no_written_items(n), no_items(n)},
 3486:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 3487:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3488: 			     {notify, true},
 3489: 			     {head, header}, {size, {100,No}}]),

 3495:     {2, 4}  = {no_written_items(n), no_items(n)},

 3667: 
 3668: change_size_before(doc) -> 
 3669:     ["Change size of a wrap log file before we have reached "
 3670:      "to the file index corresponding to the new size"];
 3671: change_size_before(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3672: 
 3673:     Log_1_1 = "first log  first message",
 3674:     Log_1_2 = "first log  second message",
 3675:     Log_2_1 = "second log  first message",
 3676:     Log_2_2 = "second log  second message",
 3677:     Log_3_1 = "third log  first message",
 3678:     Log_3_2 = "third log  second message",
 3679:     Log_4_1 = "fourth log  first message",
 3680:     Log_4_2 = "fourth log  second message",
 3681:     Log_5_1 = "fifth log  first message",
 3682:     Log_5_2 = "fifth log  second message",
 3683:     Log_1_2_1 = "first log  second round 1",
 3684:     Log_1_2_2 = "first log  second round 2",
 3685: 
 3686: 
 3687:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3688:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 3689:     del(File, 5),
 3690:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File},
 3691: 			     {type, wrap}, {size, {100,5}}]),
 3692:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3693:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3694:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3695:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3696:     disk_log:change_size(a, {100, 3}),
 3697:     [Log_1_1, Log_1_2,
 3698:      Log_2_1, Log_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3699:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3700:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 3701:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3702:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_2),
 3703:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3704:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3705:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3706: 
 3707:     disk_log:close(a),
 3708:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3709: 			     {size, {100,3}}]),
 3710:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3711:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3712:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3713:     disk_log:close(a),
 3714:     del(File, 5),
 3715: 
 3716:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3717: 			     {size, {60,5}}, {format, external}]),
 3718:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_1),
 3719:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_2),
 3720:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_2_1),
 3721:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_2_2),
 3722:     disk_log:change_size(a, {60, 3}),
 3723:     ok = disk_log:sync(a),
 3724:     {ok, Fd1} = file:open(File ++ ".1", [read]),
 3725:     Log11_12 = Log_1_1 ++ Log_1_2,
 3726:     {ok,Log11_12} = file:read(Fd1, 200),
 3727:     ok = file:close(Fd1),
 3728:     {ok, Fd2} = file:open(File ++ ".2", [read]),
 3729:     Log21_22 = Log_2_1 ++ Log_2_2,
 3730:     {ok,Log21_22} = file:read(Fd2, 200),
 3731:     ok = file:close(Fd2),
 3732:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_3_1),
 3733:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_3_2),
 3734:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3735:     disk_log:blog(a, Log_1_2_2),
 3736:     ok = disk_log:sync(a),
 3737:     {ok, Fd2a} = file:open(File ++ ".2", [read]),
 3738:     {ok,Log21_22} = file:read(Fd2a, 200),
 3739:     ok = file:close(Fd2a),
 3740:     {ok, Fd3a} = file:open(File ++ ".3", [read]),
 3741:     Log31_32 = Log_3_1 ++ Log_3_2,
 3742:     {ok,Log31_32} = file:read(Fd3a, 200),
 3743:     ok = file:close(Fd3a),
 3744:     {ok, Fd1a} = file:open(File ++ ".1", [read]),
 3745:     Log121_122 = Log_1_2_1 ++ Log_1_2_2,
 3746:     {ok,Log121_122} = file:read(Fd1a, 200),
 3747:     ok = file:close(Fd1a),
 3748: 
 3749:     disk_log:close(a),
 3750:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3751: 			     {size, {60,3}}, {format, external}]),
 3752:     {ok, Fd2b} = file:open(File ++ ".2", [read]),
 3753:     {ok,Log21_22} = file:read(Fd2b, 200),
 3754:     ok = file:close(Fd2b),
 3755:     {ok, Fd3b} = file:open(File ++ ".3", [read]),

 3759:     {ok,Log121_122} = file:read(Fd1b, 200),
 3760:     ok = file:close(Fd1b),
 3761:     disk_log:close(a),
 3762:     del(File, 5),
 3763:

 3765:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3766:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3767:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3768:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),

 3771:      Log_2_1, Log_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3772:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3773:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3774:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,

 3781:      Log_3_1,
 3782:      Log_1_2_1] = get_all_terms(a),

 3818: %% Change size of a wrap log file while logging to a file index
 3819: %% between the old and the new size.
 3820: change_size_during(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3821: 
 3822:     Log_1_1 = "first log  first message",
 3823:     Log_1_2 = "first log  second message",
 3824:     Log_2_1 = "second log  first message",
 3825:     Log_2_2 = "second log  second message",
 3826:     Log_3_1 = "third log  first message",
 3827:     Log_3_2 = "third log  second message",
 3828:     Log_4_1 = "fourth log  first message",
 3829:     Log_4_2 = "fourth log  second message",
 3830:     Log_5_1 = "fifth log  first message",
 3831:     Log_5_2 = "fifth log  second message",
 3832:     Log_1_2_1 = "first log  second round 1",
 3833:     Log_1_2_2 = "first log  second round 2",
 3834:     Log_2_2_1 = "second log  second round 1",
 3835:     Log_2_2_2 = "second log  second round 2",
 3836:     Log_3_2_1 = "third log  second round 1",
 3837:     Log_3_2_2 = "third log  second round 2",
 3838:     Log_1_3_1 = "first log  third round 1",
 3839:     Log_1_3_2 = "first log  third round 2",
 3840: 
 3841:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3842:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 3843:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,5}}]),
 3844:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3845:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3846:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3847:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3848:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3849:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 3850:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_1),
 3851:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_2),
 3852:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_1),
 3853:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_2),
 3854:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3855:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3856:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3857:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3858:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3859:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 3860:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_1),
 3861:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_2),
 3862:     disk_log:change_size(a, {100, 3}),
 3863:     [Log_5_1, Log_5_2,
 3864:      Log_1_1, Log_1_2,
 3865:      Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3866:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3867:      Log_4_1, Log_4_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3868:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_1),
 3869:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2_2),
 3870:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3871:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3872:      Log_4_1, Log_4_2,
 3873:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3874: 
 3875:     disk_log:close(a),
 3876:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,3}}]),
 3877:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3878:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 3879:      Log_4_1, Log_4_2,
 3880:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3881:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2_1),
 3882:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2_2),
 3883:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2_1),
 3884:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2_2),
 3885:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_3_1),
 3886:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_3_2),
 3887:     [Log_2_2_1, Log_2_2_2,
 3888:      Log_3_2_1, Log_3_2_2,
 3889:      Log_1_3_1, Log_1_3_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3890:     disk_log:close(a),
 3891:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,3}}]),
 3892:     [Log_2_2_1, Log_2_2_2,
 3893:      Log_3_2_1, Log_3_2_2,
 3894:      Log_1_3_1, Log_1_3_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3895:     disk_log:close(a),
 3896:     del(File, 5),
 3897: 
 3898:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}, {size, {100,5}}]),
 3899:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3900:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3901:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 3902:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 3903:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3904:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 3905:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_1),
 3906:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_2),
 3907:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_1),
 3908:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_2),
 3909:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3910:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3911:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),

 3917:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_1),
 3918:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_2),

 3920:     [Log_1_1, Log_1_2,

 3930:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2_2),

 3935:      Log_1_3_1, Log_1_3_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3936:

 3939:     [Log_2_2_1, Log_2_2_2,
 3940:      Log_3_2_1, Log_3_2_2,

 3946: %% Change size of a wrap log file before we have reached (on the
 3947: %% second round) to the file index corresponding to the new size.
 3948: change_size_after(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3949: 
 3950:     Log_1_1 = "first log  first message",
 3951:     Log_1_2 = "first log  second message",
 3952:     Log_2_1 = "second log  first message",
 3953:     Log_2_2 = "second log  second message",
 3954:     Log_3_1 = "third log  first message",
 3955:     Log_3_2 = "third log  second message",
 3956:     Log_4_1 = "fourth log  first message",
 3957:     Log_4_2 = "fourth log  second message",
 3958:     Log_5_1 = "fifth log  first message",
 3959:     Log_5_2 = "fifth log  second message",
 3960:     Log_1_2_1 = "first log  second round 1",
 3961:     Log_1_2_2 = "first log  second round 2",
 3962: 
 3963:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 3964:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 3965:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3966: 			     {size, {100,5}}]),
 3967:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 3968:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 3969:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),

 3983:      Log_4_1, Log_4_2,
 3984:      Log_5_1, Log_5_2,

 3987:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 3988:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),

 3991:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,

 3993:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 3994:

 3996:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 3997: 			     {size, {100,3}}]),
 3998:     [Log_2_1, Log_2_2,
 3999:      Log_3_1, Log_3_2,
 4000:      Log_1_2_1, Log_1_2_2] = get_all_terms(a),
 4001:     disk_log:close(a),
 4002:     del(File, 5),
 4003:

 4005: 			     {size, {100,5}}]),
 4006:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 4007:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),

 4010:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_1),
 4011:     disk_log:log(a, Log_3_2),
 4012:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_1),
 4013:     disk_log:log(a, Log_4_2),
 4014:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_1),
 4015:     disk_log:log(a, Log_5_2),
 4016:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_1),
 4017:     disk_log:log(a, Log_1_2),
 4018:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_1),
 4019:     disk_log:log(a, Log_2_2),
 4020:     disk_log:change_size(a, {60, 3}),
 4021:     [Log_3_1,Log_3_2,

 4043: %% Open an existing wrap log without size option .
 4044: default_size(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4045:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4046:     File = filename:join(Dir, "a.LOG"),
 4047:     {error, {badarg, size}} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File},
 4048:                                                    {type, wrap}]),
 4049: 
 4050:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4051:                                    {size, {100,5}}]),
 4052:     disk_log:close(a),
 4053: 
 4054:     {ok, a} = disk_log:open([{name,a}, {file, File}, {type, wrap}]),
 4055:     {100, 5} = disk_log_1:read_size_file(File),
 4056:     ok = disk_log:close(a),
 4057:     del(File, 5).
 4058: 
 4059: %% Testing change_size/2 a bit more...
 4060: change_size2(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4061:     
 4062:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4063:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 4064:     No = 4,
 4065:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 4066: 
 4067:     %% External halt.
 4068:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {size, 100000},
 4069:                                    {format, external}, {type, halt}]),
 4070:     B = mk_bytes(60), % 56 actually...
 4071:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [B,list_to_binary(B),B]),
 4072:     Error1 = {error, {new_size_too_small,n,168}} =
 4073:         disk_log:change_size(n, 167),
 4074:     "The current size" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 4075:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, infinity),
 4076:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, 168),
 4077:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4078:     file:delete(File), % cleanup
 4079: 
 4080:     %% External wrap.
 4081:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4082: 				   {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 4083: 				   {format, external}]),
 4084:     BB = mk_bytes(160),
 4085:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB, BB, BB]), % create all files
 4086:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4087:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4088:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB]),
 4089:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4090:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4091:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 2}),
 4092:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 2}),
 4093:     {100, 2} = sz(n),
 4094:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [BB, BB]),
 4095:     ok = disk_log:balog_terms(n, [BB]),
 4096:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB]),
 4097:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4098:     rec(4, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4099:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 4}),
 4100:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4101:     del(File, No),
 4102: 
 4103:     %% Internal wrap.
 4104:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4105: 				   {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true},
 4106: 				   {format, internal}]),
 4107:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB, BB, BB]), % create all files
 4108:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4109:     rec(3, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4110:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB]),
 4111:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4112:     rec(2, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4113:     ok = disk_log:change_size(n, {100, 2}),
 4114:     {100, 2} = sz(n),
 4115:     ok = disk_log:blog_terms(n, [BB, BB, BB, BB]),
 4116:     %% Used to be one message, but now one per wrapped file.
 4117:     rec(4, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4118:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4119:     del(File, No).
 4120: 
 4121: %% OTP-3484: truncating index file.
 4122: change_size_truncate(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4123:     
 4124:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4125:     File = filename:join(Dir, "bert.LOG"),
 4126:     No = 3,
 4127:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 4128: 
 4129:     %% The problem here is truncation of the index file. One cannot easily
 4130:     %% check that the index file is correctly updated, but print_index_file()
 4131:     %% can be used to follow the progress more closely.
 4132: 
 4133:     %% Part 1.
 4134:     %% Change the size immediately after creating the log, while there
 4135:     %% are no log files. This used to write stuff a negative offset
 4136:     %% from the beginning of the file.
 4137:     del(File, No+1),
 4138:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {type,wrap}, {file, File},
 4139: 				      {notify, true}, {size,{1000,255}}]),
 4140:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,No}),
 4141:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4142:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4143:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4144:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4145:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4146:     3 = curf(bert),
 4147:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4148:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4149:     1 = curf(bert),
 4150:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4151:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4152:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4153:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4154: 
 4155:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4156:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4157:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4158:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4159:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4160:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4161: 
 4162:     %% Three items expected.
 4163:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4164:     3 = curf(bert),
 4165:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,1}),
 4166:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4167:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4168:     %% Three items expected.
 4169:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4170:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4171:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4172:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4173:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4174:     %% One item expected.
 4175:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4176: 
 4177:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4178:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4179:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4180:     del(File, No),
 4181: 
 4182:     %% Part 2.
 4183:     %% Change the size twice, the second time while the the effects of
 4184:     %% the first changed have not yet been handled. Finally close before
 4185:     %% the index file has been truncated.
 4186: 
 4187:     del(File, No),
 4188:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {type,wrap}, {file, File},
 4189: 				      {notify, true}, {size,{100,No}}]),
 4190:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4191:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4192:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4193:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4194:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4195: 
 4196:     3 = curf(bert),
 4197:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,No-1}),
 4198: 
 4199:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4200:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4201: 
 4202:     1 = curf(bert),
 4203:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,No+1}),
 4204: 
 4205:     %% Three items expected.
 4206:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4207: 
 4208:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4209:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4210: 
 4211:     %% Three items expected.
 4212:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4213: 
 4214:     2 = curf(bert),
 4215:     ok = disk_log:change_size(bert,{100,1}),
 4216: 
 4217:     %% Three items expected.
 4218:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4219: 
 4220:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4221:     
 4222:     %% State: .siz is 1, current file is 2, index file size is 3...
 4223: 
 4224:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {file, File},
 4225: 				      {type,wrap}, {notify, true}]),
 4226:     
 4227:     %% Three items expected.
 4228:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4229:     
 4230:     2 = curf(bert),
 4231:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4232:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 1}}),
 4233:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4234: 
 4235:     {ok, bert} = disk_log:open([{name,bert}, {file, File},
 4236: 				      {type,wrap}, {notify, true}]),
 4237:     
 4238:     %% Two items expected.
 4239:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4240:     
 4241:     1 = curf(bert),
 4242:     ok = disk_log:blog(bert, B),
 4243:     %% Expect {wrap 0}. Nothing lost now, last wrap notification
 4244:     %% reported one lost item.
 4245:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), bert, {wrap, 0}}),
 4246: 
 4247:     %% One item expected.
 4248:     %% disk_log_1:print_index_file("bert.LOG.idx"),
 4249:     ok = disk_log:close(bert),
 4250: 
 4251:     del(File, No),
 4252:     ok.
 4253: 
 4254: %% Change notify and head.
 4255: change_attribute(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4256: 
 4257:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4258:     File = filename:join(Dir, "n.LOG"),
 4259:     No = 4,
 4260:     del(File, No),	% cleanup
 4261:     B = mk_bytes(60),
 4262: 
 4263:     Q = qlen(),
 4264: 
 4265:     %% test change_notify
 4266:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4267: 				   {size, {100,No}}]),
 4268:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}]), % ignored...
 4269:     ok = disk_log:log_terms(n, [B,B]),
 4270:     {error, {badarg, notify}} = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), wrong),
 4271:     ok = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), false),
 4272:     ok = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), true),
 4273:     Error1 = {error, {not_owner, _}} =
 4274:         disk_log:change_notify(n, none, true),
 4275:     "The pid" ++ _ = format_error(Error1),
 4276:     2 = no_written_items(n),
 4277:     0 = users(n),
 4278:     Parent = self(),
 4279:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> disk_log:close(n), Parent ! {self(),done} end),
 4280:     receive {Pid, done} -> ok end,
 4281:     0 = users(n),
 4282:     1 = length(owners(n)),
 4283: 
 4284:     %% test change_header
 4285:     {error, {badarg, head}} = disk_log:change_header(n, none),
 4286:     {error, {badarg, head}} =
 4287: 	disk_log:change_header(n, {head_func, {1,2,3}}),
 4288:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, header}),
 4289:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 4290:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4291:     4 = no_written_items(n),
 4292:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, none}),
 4293:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 4294:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 0}}),
 4295:     5 = no_written_items(n),
 4296:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n,
 4297: 			     {head_func, {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,header}]}}),
 4298:     ok = disk_log:log(n, B),
 4299:     rec(1, {disk_log, node(), n, {wrap, 1}}),
 4300:     7 = no_written_items(n),
 4301:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4302:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:close(n),
 4303:     del(File, No),
 4304:     file:delete(File), % cleanup
 4305:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {format, external},
 4306: 				   {type, halt}]),
 4307:     {error, {badarg, head}} = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, header}),
 4308:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, "header"}),
 4309:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4310:     file:delete(File),
 4311:     
 4312:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4313: 				   {size, {100,No}}]),
 4314:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4315: 				   {size, {100,No}}]),
 4316:     ok = disk_log:change_notify(n, self(), true),
 4317:     ok = disk_log:change_header(n, {head, tjolahopp}),
 4318:     {ok, n} = disk_log:open([{name, n}, {file, File}, {type, wrap},
 4319: 				   {size, {100,No}}, {notify, true}]),
 4320:     ok = disk_log:close(n),
 4321:     {error, no_such_log} = disk_log:info(n),
 4322:     Q = qlen(),
 4323:     del(File, No).

 4325: 
 4326: %% OTP-6278. open/1 creates no status or crash report.
 4327: otp_6278(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4328:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4329:     File = filename:join(Dir, "no_such_dir/no_such_file"),
 4330:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE, self()),
 4331:     {error, {file_error, _, _}} =
 4332:         disk_log:open([{name,n},{file,File}]),
 4333:     receive
 4334: 	{crash_report,_Pid,Report} ->
 4335: 	    io:format("Unexpected: ~p\n", [Report]),
 4336: 	    ct:fail(failed)
 4337:     after 1000 ->
 4338:             ok
 4339:     end,
 4340:     error_logger:delete_report_handler(?MODULE).
 4341: 
 4342: %% OTP-10131. head_func type.
 4343: otp_10131(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4344:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4345:     Log = otp_10131,
 4346:     File = filename:join(Dir, lists:concat([Log, ".LOG"])),
 4347:     HeadFunc = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head"}]},
 4348:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},{file,File},
 4349:                                {head_func, HeadFunc}]),
 4350:     HeadFunc = info(Log, head, undef),
 4351:     HeadFunc2 = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"head2"}]},
 4352:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head_func, HeadFunc2}),
 4353:     HeadFunc2 = info(Log, head, undef),
 4354:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 4355:     ok.
 4356: 
 4357: %% OTP-16768. Bad number of items with truncate/1. ERL-1312, ERL-1313.
 4358: otp_16768(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4359:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4360:     Log = otp_16768,
 4361:     File = filename:join(Dir, Log),
 4362:     Header = <<"123456789\n">>,
 4363:     head_count(Log, File, Header, external, 25),
 4364:     head_count(Log, File, none, external, 20),
 4365:     head_count(Log, File, Header, internal, 30),
 4366:     head_count(Log, File, none, internal, 20),
 4367:     ok.
 4368: 
 4369: head_count(Log, File, Header, Format, Expected) ->
 4370:     del(File, 10),
 4371:     Content = <<"1234567890123456789\n">>,
 4372:     HeaderSize = case Header of
 4373:                      none -> 0;
 4374:                      _ -> byte_size(Header)
 4375:                  end,
 4376:     %% 5 files for the external format, more for the internal format
 4377:     MaxSizePerFile = HeaderSize + (5 * byte_size(Content)) - 1,
 4378:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{file, File},
 4379:                                {name, Log},
 4380:                                {format, Format},
 4381:                                {head, Header},
 4382:                                {size, {MaxSizePerFile, 999}},
 4383:                                {type, wrap}
 4384:                               ]),
 4385:     ok = disk_log:truncate(Log),
 4386:     lists:foreach(fun(_I) -> disk_log:blog(Log, Content) end,
 4387:                   lists:seq(1, 20)),
 4388:     DiskLogInfo = disk_log:info(Log),
 4389:     Expected = proplists:get_value(no_items, DiskLogInfo),
 4390:     ok = disk_log:close(Log).
 4391: 
 4392: otp_16809(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 4393:     Dir = ?privdir(Conf),
 4394:     Log = otp_16809,
 4395:     File = filename:join(Dir, lists:concat([Log, ".LOG"])),
 4396:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},{file,File}]),
 4397:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4398:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, none}),
 4399:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4400:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, some_header}),
 4401:     %% Notice: the head argument as a binary:
 4402:     true = term_to_binary(some_header) =:= info(Log, head, undef),
 4403:     HeadFunc = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,a_header}]},
 4404:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head_func, HeadFunc}),
 4405:     HeadFunc = info(Log, head, undef),
 4406:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
 4407: 
 4408:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name,Log},
 4409:                                {file,File},
 4410:                                {format,external}]),
 4411:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4412:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, none}),
 4413:     none = info(Log, head, undef),
 4414:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head, "some header"}),
 4415:     %% Notice: the head argument as a binary:
 4416:     <<"some header">> = info(Log, head, undef),
 4417:     HeadFunc2 = {?MODULE, head_fun, [{ok,"a header"}]},
 4418:     ok = disk_log:change_header(Log, {head_func, HeadFunc2}),
 4419:     HeadFunc2 = info(Log, head, undef),
 4420:     ok = disk_log:close(Log).
 4421: 
 4422: mark(FileName, What) ->
 4423:     {ok,Fd} = file:open(FileName, [raw, binary, read, write]),
 4424:     {ok,_} = file:position(Fd, 4),
 4425:     ok = file:write(Fd, What),
 4426:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 4427: 
 4428: crash(File, Where) ->
 4429:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,write]),
 4430:     file:position(Fd, Where),
 4431:     ok = file:write(Fd, [10]),
 4432:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 4433: 
 4434: unwritable(Fname) ->
 4435:     {ok, Info} = file:read_file_info(Fname),
 4436:     Mode = Info#file_info.mode - 8#00200,
 4437:     file:write_file_info(Fname, Info#file_info{mode = Mode}).
 4438: 
 4439: writable(Fname) ->
 4440:     {ok, Info} = file:read_file_info(Fname),
 4441:     Mode = Info#file_info.mode bor 8#00200,
 4442:     file:write_file_info(Fname, Info#file_info{mode = Mode}).
 4443: 
 4444: truncate(File, Where) ->
 4445:     {ok, Fd} = file:open(File, [read,write]),
 4446:     file:position(Fd, Where),
 4447:     ok = file:truncate(Fd),
 4448:     ok = file:close(Fd).
 4449: 
 4450: file_size(File) ->
 4451:     {ok, F} = file:read_file_info(File),
 4452:     F#file_info.size.
 4453: 
 4454: copy_wrap_log(FromName, N, FromDir, ToDir) ->
 4455:     copy_wrap_log(FromName, FromName, N, FromDir, ToDir).
 4456: 
 4457: copy_wrap_log(FromName, ToName, N, FromDir, ToDir) ->
 4458:     Fun = fun(E) ->
 4459: 	     From = join(FromDir, io_lib:format("~s.~p", [FromName, E])),
 4460: 	     To = join(ToDir, io_lib:format("~s.~p", [ToName, E])),
 4461: 	     case file:read_file_info(From) of
 4462:                  {ok, _FileInfo} ->
 4463:                      copy_file(From, To);
 4464:                  _Else ->
 4465:                      ok
 4466:              end
 4467: 	  end,
 4468:     Exts = [idx, siz | lists:seq(1, N)],
 4469:     lists:foreach(Fun, Exts).
 4470: 
 4471: -define(BUFSIZE, 8192).
 4472: 
 4473: copy_file(Src, Dest) ->
 4474:     %% io:format("copying from ~p to ~p~n", [Src, Dest]),
 4475:     {ok, InFd} = file:open(Src, [raw, binary, read]),
 4476:     {ok, OutFd} = file:open(Dest, [raw, binary, write]),
 4477:     ok = copy_file1(InFd, OutFd),
 4478:     file:close(InFd),
 4479:     file:close(OutFd),
 4480:     ok = file:change_mode(Dest, 8#0666).
 4481: 
 4482: copy_file1(InFd, OutFd) ->
 4483:     case file:read(InFd, ?BUFSIZE) of
 4484:         {ok, Bin} ->
 4485:             ok = file:write(OutFd, Bin),
 4486:             copy_file1(InFd, OutFd);
 4487:         eof  ->
 4488:             ok
 4489:     end.
 4490: 
 4491: 
 4492: join(A, B) ->
 4493:     filename:nativename(filename:join(A, B)).
 4494: 
 4495: add_ext(Name, Ext) ->
 4496:     lists:concat([Name, ".", Ext]).
 4497: 
 4498: log(_Name, 0) ->
 4499:     ok;
 4500: log(Name, N) ->
 4501:     ok = disk_log:log(Name, "this is a logged message number " ++ 
 4502:                       integer_to_list(N)),
 4503:     log(Name, N-1).
 4504: 
 4505: format_error(E) ->
 4506:     lists:flatten(disk_log:format_error(E)).
 4507: 
 4508: check_pps({Ports0,Procs0} = P0) ->
 4509:     case pps() of
 4510:         P0 ->
 4511:             ok;
 4512:         _ ->
 4513:             timer:sleep(500),
 4514:             case pps() of
 4515:                 P0 ->
 4516:                     ok;
 4517:                 {Ports1,Procs1} = P1 ->
 4518: 		    case {Ports1 -- Ports0, Procs1 -- Procs0} of
 4519: 			{[], []} -> ok;
 4520: 			{PortsDiff,ProcsDiff} ->
 4521: 			    io:format("failure, got ~p~n, expected ~p\n", [P1, P0]),
 4522: 			    show("Old port", Ports0 -- Ports1),
 4523: 			    show("New port", PortsDiff),
 4524: 			    show("Old proc", Procs0 -- Procs1),
 4525: 			    show("New proc", ProcsDiff),
 4526: 			    ct:fail(failed)
 4527: 		    end
 4528: 	    end
 4529:     end.
 4530: 
 4531: show(_S, []) ->
 4532:     ok;
 4533: show(S, [{Pid, Name, InitCall}|Pids]) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 4534:     io:format("~s: ~w (~w), ~w: ~p~n",
 4535:               [S, Pid, proc_reg_name(Name), InitCall,
 4536:                erlang:process_info(Pid)]),
 4537:     show(S, Pids);
 4538: show(S, [{Port, _}|Ports]) when is_port(Port)->
 4539:     io:format("~s: ~w: ~p~n", [S, Port, erlang:port_info(Port)]),
 4540:     show(S, Ports).
 4541: 
 4542: pps() ->
 4543:     timer:sleep(100),
 4544:     {port_list(), process_list()}.
 4545: 
 4546: port_list() ->
 4547:     [{P,safe_second_element(erlang:port_info(P, name))} ||
 4548:         P <- erlang:ports()].
 4549: 
 4550: process_list() ->
 4551:     [{P,process_info(P, registered_name),
 4552:       safe_second_element(process_info(P, initial_call))} ||
 4553:         P <- processes(), erlang:is_process_alive(P)].
 4554: 
 4555: proc_reg_name({registered_name, Name}) -> Name;
 4556: proc_reg_name([]) -> no_reg_name.
 4557: 
 4558: safe_second_element({_,Info}) -> Info;
 4559: safe_second_element(Other) -> Other.
 4560: 
 4561: 
 4562: qlen() ->
 4563:     {_, {_, N}} = lists:keysearch(message_queue_len, 1, process_info(self())),
 4564:     N.
 4565: 
 4566: owners(Log) ->
 4567: %%     io:format("owners ~p~n", [info(Log, owners, -1)]),
 4568:     info(Log, owners, -1).
 4569: users(Log) ->
 4570: %%     io:format("users ~p~n", [info(Log, users, -1)]),
 4571:     info(Log, users, -1).
 4572: status(Log) ->
 4573: %%     io:format("status ~p~n", [info(Log, status, -1)]),
 4574:     info(Log, status, -1).
 4575: no_items(Log) ->
 4576: %%     io:format("no_items ~p~n", [info(Log, no_items, -1)]),
 4577:     info(Log, no_items, -1).
 4578: no_written_items(Log) ->
 4579: %%     io:format("no_written_items ~p~n", [info(Log, no_written_items, -1)]),
 4580:     info(Log, no_written_items, -1).
 4581: sz(Log) -> 
 4582: %%     io:format("sz ~p~n", [info(Log, size, -1)]),
 4583:     info(Log, size, -1).
 4584: curb(Log) -> 
 4585: %%     io:format("curb ~p~n", [info(Log, no_current_bytes, -1)]),
 4586:     info(Log, no_current_bytes, -1).
 4587: curf(Log) -> 
 4588: %%     io:format("curf ~p~n", [info(Log, current_file, -1)]),
 4589:     info(Log, current_file, -1).
 4590: cur_cnt(Log) -> 
 4591: %%     io:format("cur_cnt ~p~n", [info(Log, no_current_items, -1)]),
 4592:     info(Log, no_current_items, -1).
 4593: no_overflows(Log) ->
 4594: %%     io:format("no_overflows ~p~n", [info(Log, no_overflows, -1)]),
 4595:     info(Log, no_overflows, -1).
 4596: 
 4597: info(Log, What, Undef) ->
 4598:     case lists:keysearch(What, 1, disk_log:info(Log)) of
 4599:         {value, {What, Value}} -> Value;
 4600:         false -> Undef
 4601:     end.
 4602: 
 4603: rec(0, _) ->
 4604:      ok;
 4605: rec(N, Msg) ->
 4606:     receive
 4607: 	Msg ->
 4608: 	    rec(N-1, Msg)
 4609:     after 100 ->
 4610: 	    test_server_fail({no_msg, N, Msg})
 4611:     end.
 4612: 
 4613: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 4614: %% The error_logger handler used.
 4615: %% (Copied from stdlib/test/proc_lib_SUITE.erl.)
 4616: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
 4617: init(Tester) ->
 4618:     {ok, Tester}.
 4619:     
 4620: handle_event({error_report, _GL, {Pid, crash_report, Report}}, Tester) ->
 4621:     Tester ! {crash_report, Pid, Report},
 4622:     {ok, Tester};
 4623: handle_event({info_msg, _GL, {Pid, F,A}}, Tester) ->
 4624:     Tester ! {info_msg, Pid, F, A},
 4625:     {ok, Tester};
 4626: handle_event(_Event, State) ->
 4627:     {ok, State}.
 4628: 
 4629: handle_info(_, State) ->
 4630:     {ok, State}.
 4631: 
 4632: handle_call(_Query, State) -> {ok, {error, bad_query}, State}.
 4633: 
 4634: terminate(_Reason, State) ->
 4635:     State.
